programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas
programme.desc: Zac believes he is being framed. Preston invites a guest to Danni's house without informing her. Andi takes a chance and goes against the wise counsel of her dear friends. (S2, ep17)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas
programme.desc: Karen becomes very upset with Andi. Fatima threatens an attorney at the firm. Maurice walks into his home and makes a shocking discovery. (S2, ep18)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas
programme.desc: Gary comes to Andi's rescue after she gets herself into a compromising situation. Zac talks seriously to a new woman who values him in a way no woman ever has. (S2, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas
programme.desc: Fatima comes to Andi's rescue. Sabrina realises she made a terrible mistake. Zac confronts Karen about why he could never betray her. (S2, ep20)

programme.title: The Game: Skeletons
programme.desc: In the fifth season premiere, Melanie contends with Derwin's abortion accusation by leading him to believe he was the father of a child she terminated in college.

programme.title: The Game: Truth Pact
programme.desc: In the second half of the fifth season opener, Melanie reveals a huge confession to Derwin regarding the abortion that he assumed was of their child.

programme.title: The Game: No Money Mo Problems
programme.desc: Melanie feels like something is missing in her life after Derwin goes back to Irv as his manager.

programme.title: The Game: The Black People Episode
programme.desc: Melanie and Tasha's feud finds a public forum while preparing for the annual Sunbeams fashion show.

programme.title: The Game: Grand Opening, Grand Closing
programme.desc: Jason's ego takes a hit when Chardonnay rejects his proposal about hooking up after their upcoming annulment.

programme.title: The Game: Drink.Pray.Love
programme.desc: Melanie has a showdown with Tasha at Drop Bar. Meanwhile, Malik has a hard time letting go of his dream home when he's forced to short sell his mansion.

programme.title: The Game: The Tricks Episode
programme.desc: When a YouTube video of Malik and Derwin doing football tricks goes viral, the guys ride the wave hoping it takes Malik off the bench and back onto the field.

programme.title: The Game: Matchmaker, Matchmaker...Mind Your Business!
programme.desc: Tasha falls for a new man, Reynaldo, who turns out to be a male escort. Meanwhile, Melanie, in the spirit of fostering a friendship with Janay, throws a dinner party for her and her new man, Noah.

programme.title: The Game: Keep Your Friends Close And Your Prostitutes Closer
programme.desc: Melanie attempts to foster goodwill between herself and Janay by convincing Derwin to make an effort to get to know Noah.
programme.sub-title: Keep Your Friends Close And Your Prostitutes Closer

programme.title: Run's House: Rev Mom
programme.desc: Rev and Justine discover that Justine is pregnant. As the family deals with the news Justine realizes that she has plenty she wants to accomplish before she feels immobilized by her pregnancy.

programme.title: Run's House: Downward Facing Dawg
programme.desc: Seeking relief from the stress of his life, Run seeks the advice of his brother, Russell. Run decides to shadow his brother and give yoga a try in hopes that peace will find him.

programme.title: Run's House: Anger Management
programme.desc: Mom and Dad express concern over Russy's temper and decide to get professional help.

programme.title: Run's House: Baby Booming
programme.desc: When Angela decides that she needs a new dog as a fashion accessory Rev puts his foot down.

programme.title: Run's House: Victoria Anne Simmons
programme.desc: Season three picks up with a very pregnant Justine and an anxious family awaiting the birth of their new child and sibling.

programme.title: Run's House: Hangin' with Run
programme.desc: Rev Run notices that Jojo isn't spending much time at home, instead, opting to hang out with his friends away from home.

programme.title: Run's House: Weight a Minute
programme.desc: Angela feels fat and actually thinks she needs to lose fifteen to twenty pounds. Vanessa thinks she's nuts for thinking she needs to lose that much weight and tells Mom and Dad.

programme.title: Run's House: Sneaker Pimps & Mini Moguls
programme.desc: Russy tells Run he wants to make more money by selling the toys he no longer uses.

programme.title: Run's House: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: Vanessa and Angela are in desperate need of money to decorate their apartment.

programme.title: Run's House: Home Alone
programme.desc: With the release of Justine's children's book fast approaching, Run suggests a quiet, peaceful weekend away, to help her prepare for an upcoming book reading.

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Who's Wooing Who? Episode
programme.desc: When Mona is courted and gets a job offer from another record label, she has to make a choice between staying at Delicious Records or moving on. Meanwhile, in order to keep up with the Jones‚Äô, Big Dee Dee plans an extravagant birthday party for Drew.
programme.sub-title: The Big Who's Wooing Who? Episode

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Thorne In My Side Episode
programme.desc: When Phyllis gets into trouble with her Homeowner's Association, Dee Dee comes to her defense, but ends up causing more harm than good.
programme.sub-title: The Big Thorne In My Side Episode

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Pomp And Circumstance Episode
programme.desc: Dee Dee starts to feel the pressure as her law school graduation fast approaches and she hasn't landed a job. Meanwhile, Mona panics when Phyllis finds a terrific apartment in her neighborhood.
programme.sub-title: The Big Pomp And Circumstance Episode

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Gen-Why Me Episode
programme.desc: When Charles cuts Dee Dee off financially after she announces she wants to go back and get another degree, Dee Dee must get a 'regular' job and face life in the real world.

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Dollars And Sense Episode
programme.desc: With her new found independence in tow, Dee Dee enlists Phyllis's help in learning the value of a dollar. Mona and Spencer bump heads when Spencer goes above Mona to sign a new music act she doesn't approve of.
programme.sub-title: The Big Dollars And Sense Episode

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Frozen Assets Episode
programme.desc: Mona's birthday goes sour when she gets an unwelcome present from her mother. While Dee Dee continues to struggle with her life direction, she is presented with a new career option.

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Young & The Restless Episode
programme.desc: Mona becomes jealous of her mother when she begins dating a much younger man. Adam begins feeling like a loser when he realizes everyone is accomplishing their goals except him.
programme.sub-title: The Big Young & The Restless Episode

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big Off Pitch Episode
programme.desc: Dee Dee enlists Mona's help when her agency's star baseball client wants to retire and embark on a music career. Big Dee Dee must break bad news to Phyllis when her cat, Fred, turns up missing.

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big State Of The Reunion Episode
programme.desc: Mona must face old demons when she attends her 10 year high school reunion. Kai mounts an investigation after paraphernalia goes missing from the Delicious stock room. Spencer sets a date to meet the girl he's been corresponding with on-line.
programme.sub-title: The Big State Of The Reunion Episode

programme.title: Half & Half: The Big How To Do And Undo It Episode
programme.desc: When Spencer has trouble dumping his new girlfriend, he enlists Dee Dee's help breaking the news. After Phyllis's new boyfriend plans a romantic weekend away, she turns to an unlikely source for help with her sex life.
programme.sub-title: The Big How To Do And Undo It Episode

programme.title: Girlfriends: Operation Does She Yield
programme.desc: Ever since Monica left William, his life‚Äôs been a mess. He can‚Äôt work, eat or function normally. Because Joan, Maya, and Lynn feel responsible for driving Monica away, they decide they‚Äôve got to do something to bring the couple back together.

programme.title: Girlfriends: A House Divided
programme.desc: When Lynn's (Persia White) new boyfriend Eldon (Kadeem Hardison), finds himself at odds with the church members over his choice of having Lynn as a girlfriend, he is faced with a tough decision.

programme.title: Girlfriends: To Be Determined / It's Been Determined
programme.desc: Joan (Tracee Ellis Ross) unexpectedly proposes to Aaron (guest star Richard T. Jones), but when he stumbles on his response, Joan decides the relationship is over and walks away.
programme.sub-title: To Be Determined / It's Been Determined

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Night Terrors
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: School House Haunting
programme.desc: PRS travels to Massachusetts to investigate an old schoolhouse where children's voices disturb a couple who've made it their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Mothman
programme.desc: Ryan takes his team to Point Pleasant, West Virginia to investigate his own personal holy grail of paranormal lore: the mysterious Mothman.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: If I Should Die...
programme.desc: Proven paranormal investigator Ken Arrington leads a new class of characters as they try to help a family cope with what appears to be a demonic spirit in their home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hell's Gate
programme.desc: Ever since Wes and his family moved into their new home in York, PA they've been struggling with a dark force that's made everyday a living hell. Wes feels his mental and physical health is in jeopardy.

programme.title: Paranormal State: First Contact
programme.desc: Washington State, a hotbed of unexplained paranormal activity. Between possible UFOs in the sky and winged creatures in the woods, Ryan and his team are forced to face their fears and deal with the question: Are we truly alone in the universe?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil in Jersey
programme.desc: PRS delves deep into the pine barrens of the Garden State to separate myth from reality about the so-called "Jersey Devil." Accompanied by a cryptozoologist the team interviews eye witnesses and experts in search of the truth.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Southern Discomfort At Sweetwater Mansion
programme.desc: PRS heads to the Deep South to investigate a haunted Antebellum Mansion in disrepair. The caretaker and volunteers at the property have many a tale to tell of paranormal activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Intervention
programme.desc: Carol Ann stays awake every night taping the voices of the dead. PRS cuts their winter break short to help her curtail her obsession and close this doorway to the dead--for good.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Who Is the Lurking Man?
programme.desc: PRS travels to Newcastle, CA to investigate a house with paranormal forces so strong, the family has cleared out. Ryan believes the Native American land may hold the key to the mystery and leads the team in a fight to reclaim a scared family's house.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Name
programme.desc: Ryan Buell and company set out on one of their most dangerous cases to date - to help a single mother who is experiencing paranormal activity in a home that was once the site of brutal murder.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Ranch
programme.desc: PRS saddles up to a remote ranch in Hunt, Texas where black shadows are being spotted and animals harmed. What's more, a mysterious crop circle has formed on the property and the horses refuse to cross it.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Haunted Connection
programme.desc: P.R.S. is called in to help a young mother tormented by an otherworldly connection to a teenage girl murdered in her neighborhood years ago. Could she have psychic ability or is there a more sinister force at work?

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Ladder
programme.desc: A large family in Shrewsbury, MA, has been living with a spirit for the last 40 years. To most of the siblings, the entity is menacing and evil, but Sandy seems to have a different connection.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Oak House
programme.desc: Yvette takes her team to Oak House, said to be one of the most haunted places in West Bromwich. Fear and fright take hold when something seems to follow them and one experience changes the belief of both Glen and Karl.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Middleton Hall
programme.desc: Yvette and her team are called to a grade II listed building that spans over 900 years in an attempt to uncover the mysterious paranormal activity that is said to occur there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 1
programme.desc: Yvette Fielding and her team take on their biggest challenge yet in a prison where many have lost their lives and some seem to have remained.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 2
programme.desc: Part two of this mammoth investigation takes the team to the condemned cell and execution room. Is it a hangman or one of the executed souls that makes itself present and causes the team to re-evaluate what they are doing.

programme.title: Most Haunted: HMP Shrewsbury Part 3
programme.desc: The concluding part of the teams biggest investigation sees Yvette get the biggest shock of.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Abbey House Museum
programme.desc: Yvette introduces a brand new Most Haunted team member, Watson, a bulldog. This location starts to give up its mysteries as soon as the team arrive and they have go film differently to accommodate a particularly aggressive poltergeist.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse stable
programme.desc: The first team ever to be allowed into the very haunted Wentworth Woodhouse Stable Block and the team film the best evidence ever, has a ghost been caught on camera? Watson sees something and team see someone who couldn‚Äôt possibly have been there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Slaughter House
programme.desc: The Slaughterhouse is Liverpool‚Äôs oldest pub and gives the team more than they bargained for as object are moved from underneath the team‚Äôs noses.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Todmoredon Church
programme.desc: For the first time Yvette takes her fearless Most Haunted team to an ordained church and graveyard. But it‚Äôs the cellar that proves the most fearful as the team get caught in a small room and they are not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Weir Mill
programme.desc: Yvette take her team to an abandoned mill where spirits are said to roam and satanic ritual taken place. What awaits them is an evening of fear that causes one of the team to leave early.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Ripon Workhouse
programme.desc: In a place where the homeless were kept and work was hard, death was often the only escape but it seems that wasn‚Äôt the way for some as their souls are said to roam this place.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Ruthin Castle
programme.desc: Yvette &¬†Karl¬†investigate a jewel in the crown of Great Britain, Ruthin Castle. They take on the infamous room 222 and soon realise they are not alone.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Chillingham Castle
programme.desc: Karl¬†& Stuart take on one of the Most Haunted rooms in this ancient castle. Whatever is there, seems desperate to make itself known.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Leeds Town Hall
programme.desc: Karl¬†ventures alone into the underneath Leeds Town Hall into the dark prison cells that is said to be haunted by a plethora of unhappy spirits, one doesn‚Äôt seem happy that¬†Karl¬†is there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Hodroyd Hall
programme.desc: Karl¬†& Stu investigate the attic of Hodroyd Hall, and soon become witness to the many strange occurances. What or who is trying to make contact?

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Champness Hall
programme.desc: Yvette,¬†Karl¬†& Stuart investigate the pride of Rochdale, Champness Hall. With loud footsteps and strange noises, the team seem to be followed by a persistent spirit.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P1
programme.desc: There are many ghost said to haunt Gloucester Prison, from the passive to the most aggressive and as Stuart enters the segregation block he soon fears for his life.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Gloucester Prison P2
programme.desc: Some places, just by their name, instill fear into those who hear it, Gloucester Prison is such a lace and¬†Karl¬†investigates the main cell block in an evening he will never forget.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Pen-Y-Lan House
programme.desc: Karl¬†& Stuart investigate the top floor of this grand Welsh house. The stories of paranormal activity soon come to life as the duo are surrounded by strange occurrences.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bron-Y-Garth Hospital Pt1
programme.desc: Stuart ventures into Bron-Y-Garth, an old workhouse and abandoned hospital. The spirits that reside here are said to be plentiful, something Stuart finds out all to soon.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Bron-Y-Garth Hospital Pt2
programme.desc: Karl¬†takes on the formidable cell block of Bron-Y-Garth,¬†¬†a former workhouse and abandoned hospital. The dark corridors are said to house many an aggressive entity, and soon¬†Karl¬†finds out first-hand what it they capable of in a climactic end.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Unseen: Doncaster Air Museum Pt1
programme.desc: The famous Air Museum in Doncaster houses many an artefact of aviation history and many spirit from its past.¬†Karl¬†investigates one of the huts that is said to be full of paranormal happenings, and he isn‚Äôt disappointed.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The People Next Door
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark must help a doctor confront a secret he's kept from everyone, including his own family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: I Was a Middle Aged Werewolf
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Jonathan helps a little boy get over his fears, and in the process, get even with his older sister!
programme.sub-title: I Was a Middle Aged Werewolf

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Jonathan casts a retired comic and his movie-star son in a play about a father and son who never got to know each other.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Amazing Man
programme.desc: A youngster turns to a fantasy world and a comic-book superhero to cope with the pain of his father's death.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: All the Colors of the Heart
programme.desc: An athlete who expects to gain his sight must counsel another man who is certain to lose his.
programme.sub-title: All the Colors of the Heart

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Why Punish the Children?
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark take on a system that keeps inmate mothers and their children apart.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dream of Wild Horses
programme.desc: The patriarch of a ranch family feels he's too old to rein in some wild horses.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: In With the "In" Crowd
programme.desc: A cop is working undercover at a school to put an end to drug use, but faces suspension because of a mistake Mark has made.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: With Love, The Claus
programme.desc: At Christmastime, Jonathan and Mark try to get a divorced couple to work together for their son's sake. Meanwhile, the holiday may be in jeopardy when a department store Santa is arrested.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Mother's Love
programme.desc: Four brothers go on the run to escape a court order that would split them up.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Time in a Bottle
programme.desc: A district attorney clashes with a lawyer who agrees to defend a friend charged with stealing.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Back to Oakland
programme.desc: Mark returns to Oakland to become a police officer again, and is reunited with his old partner. However, he discovers his old beat has become a storm of racial hatred.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: We Have Forever - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan hopes that he'll be released from his duties to be reunited with his former wife when she passes away.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Correspondent
programme.desc: A war correspondent finds himself imprisoned and facing execution. Meanwhile, Jonathan and Mark show him what's he's missed during his life by putting work ahead of family.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Aloha
programme.desc: A Hawaiian singer learns to overcome self-pity after being disabled in a truck accident.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark help a teenage cancer patient named Lee who wants to save the dolphins.
programme.sub-title: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 1

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Lee's cancer is now in remission. She gets back to work on her save-the-dolphins campaign.
programme.sub-title: A Dolphin Song for Lee - Part 2

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Trevanions have been living at Leopard's Den for over a year. The wildlife is roaming freely and the family are settled into African way of life. Business however is not good. With an abundance of game lodges competition is fierce.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: It's the grand reopening of Mara and a British wildlife charity is using the event to release a vulture back into the wild. Fatani, the new, young and ambitious manager of Mara has hired Danny as the vet to oversee the release.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Leopard's Den is looking after a sick and orphaned baby elephant called Togo. However, despite Evan and Du Plessis' constant vigil, Togo is dying from a broken heart. Evan is distraught and Du Plessis promises they will look after her together.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Sarah's absence couldn't have come at a worse time for Leopard's Den. Nature Conservation is carrying out their annual inspection and everything has to be tip top. Danny's determined they pass with flying colours and everyone is roped in to help.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: Everyone's excited at the prospect of Leopard's Den's new arrival. Bash, Danny's old tutor and Rosie's Godfather, is coming from England to help Danny grow his veterinary practice.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: The Trevanions are delighted when Fatani asks Danny to take an aggressive hippo off his hands. As they prepare for its arrival Sarah gets a bit of a shock when her mother Caroline beats the hippo to the post.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: Business is looking up at Leopard's Den but Sarah is feeling agitated. Caroline thinks it because Simon, her ex husband and Evan and Olivia's Dad, is arriving from England to get married. But Sarah has other things on her mind.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny is undertaking a drugs trial at Leopard's Den. But de-worming wildebeest isn't Caroline's idea of fun. She hates animals and finds the whole business mind-numbingly boring.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Du Plessis is in a foul mood. It's his 60th birthday and he has no intentions of celebrating it. But the Trevanions have other ideas and Caroline is organising a surprise party.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: All is quiet at Leopard's Den as Sarah, Evan and Olivia gather at the hospital. Danny has been given the all clear to go home. But Du Plessis is still unconscious and seriously ill. Caroline keeps a tender vigil at his bedside.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: New lodges nearly break the family, but they learn that it's the animals which make Leopard's Den a success.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: Danny needs an assistant but fails to see that she's right under his nose; Sarah finds out that she needs her mum.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 3
programme.desc: Leopard's Den expands and DuPlessis becomes a grandfather after a close-call with an angry elephant.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 4
programme.desc: Danny and Sarah let their past catch up with them, and Caroline and DuPlessis go shopping for lion-prey.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 5
programme.desc: A white lion brings mixed fortunes to the family and Rosie is asked the big question. Amy Kriel is the last person you expect in Africa.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Caroline's sister Judith tries to help and the drought forces Danny to sell some of his animals. Will Rosie and Max get married?

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: The drought finally throws up a fire and the wedding turns into a firefight for everyone. The omens are bad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Tragedy strikes and the Trevanians have to decide what future lies ahead of them in these difficult times.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Powder Kegs
programme.desc: When uninvited guests crash a barrio birthday party, violence erupts‚Äîleaving Enrique Urrutia dead and potentially sparking a gang war.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Loose Cannon
programme.desc: In the dead of night, a shooter on a rampage rips through a home, leaving a grandmother disfigured, her 24 year old daughter dead, and a two year-old child clinging to life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bump In the Night
programme.desc: When a pretty, young pilot is found in bed, bound and with a bullet in her head, Lt. Joe Kenda must determine if this was a random assault or payback for something that happened in the skies.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Red Highway
programme.desc: The elderly owners of a local grocery are attacked and left for dead. Working with a vague witness description, Lt. Joe Kenda leads a state-wide manhunt to catch a pair of cold-blooded killers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: A park ranger discovers the corpse of amateur boxer Corey Edge floating in a shallow creek. Kenda learns the victim had ties to the criminal underworld, and investigates a rogue‚Äôs gallery of hustlers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Sing Sing, Little Bird
programme.desc: A romantic rendezvous is cut short by a violent home invasion, leaving young business owner Kelly Knudson bleeding to death on the floor and Lt Joe Kenda is short on leads.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Everybody Lies
programme.desc: After church, deacon Robert Walton is beaten to death in a public park. The case heats up when Lt. Kenda and his team revisit an old friend with a secret. Did the religious leader have a dark side?

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Innocence
programme.desc: War hero Carl Taylor is beaten to death in the back of an empty semi truck, for no apparent reason. Lt Joe Kenda notices an unusual pattern in the victim‚Äôs head wounds.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: We Kill the Ones We Love
programme.desc: A drive-by shooting leaves Van Terry dead; to crack the case, Lt. Joe Kenda must put his faith‚Ä¶ in a burglar.
programme.sub-title: We Kill the Ones We Love

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Where is Claudia Jane
programme.desc: 15-year old CJ Bates is reported missing, and Kenda must investigate the mysterious circumstances behind disappearance of the teenager.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: With Friends Like This
programme.desc: A young man is found gunned down outside his home . Sgt. Joe Kenda and Det. John Anderson must determine whether the killer was a complete stranger, a barrio gang member, or a jealous lover.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Into Thin Air
programme.desc: 24yr old Lorraine Laribo is dropped off at a bar by her sister's boyfriend. It's the last time anyone would ever see her alive again. Kenda must use his interrogation skills to find her killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don‚Äôt add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Hail of Bullets
programme.desc: The murder of a young father stuns his close-knit community, but the investigation reveals a neighborly dispute turned deadly.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bullet With My Name On It
programme.desc: In his first year on the force, rookie patrol officer Joe Kenda quickly learns the ropes. But when he tries to singlehandedly stop a brawling mob, he finds himself facing down gunfire.
programme.sub-title: Bullet With My Name On It

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Married To The Job
programme.desc: Sgt. Joe Kenda and his officers are facing off against a barricaded gunman when he gets an emergency call from his wife.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Poker Face
programme.desc: A group of friends discover the corpse of entrepreneur Jamie Foster hidden under a blanket. Kenda e discovers that Foster‚Äôs business put him in close quarters with a host of unsavory characters.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Murder Bites
programme.desc: A young woman is found naked and strangled in a park not 200 yards from her home. It isn‚Äôt until Lt. Joe Kenda rethinks the entire case that he realizes someone has been lying.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Shallow Grave
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda and his team investigate the scene of an apparent suicide, only to be forced to flee when they discover the house is booby-trapped.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Woof and Wheels
programme.desc: People and their dogs descended on a local PETCO to meet producers in the hopes of a session with Cesar Millan. Meet two of the problem pooches. Can Cesar dial down the bad behavior of these terrors?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Seven, Macy, and Lex
programme.desc: After running headfirst into a screen door, Macy refuses to go anywhere near it, and cowers in the closet if someone opens it. A Weimaraner with a biting personality gets help from Cesar.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar explains how he reads a dog's energy and body language as he deals with two Jack Russell terriers who grew up together but fight violently.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Mufasa and Tucker
programme.desc: Mufasa, a South African Boerboel, became dog aggressive after being attacked as a puppy. Tucker, a teacup poodle ‚Äòtalks back‚Äô to his owner. Can Cesar bring back the peace in this divided household?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Luna and K9 Sniffers
programme.desc: A lab mix, has an extreme fear of dog parks, walks and noises at home. Meet a pack of dogs that spends its days keeping the port of Miami free of drugs, and explosives.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Rana & Ruby
programme.desc: Scared of everything, Ruby the Vischla deals with her neuroses by biting. At the same time, Rana barks every time bread pops in the toaster, or when the microwave goes off, or when the phone rings.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Gus, Abbey, and Vinnie
programme.desc: Tonight Show sidekick Ed McMahon‚Äôs dog is aggressive. A beagle won't leave the house. An Australian shepherd is so territorial of his owner's house that no one has visited in two years.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Fondue, Chip, Hope & Joyjoy, and Elmer
programme.desc: A Hollywood couple had to turn down work because their French bulldog failed the Doggy Daycare entrance exam. Three Jack Russells began to fight each other when their owner got a serious boyfriend.
programme.sub-title: Fondue, Chip, Hope & Joyjoy, and Elmer

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Homeboys and Hounds
programme.desc: Cesar helps two former gang members through Homeboy Industries, an outreach program designed to break the cycle of gang violence but who have problem dogs at home.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Boyfriend & Alfie
programme.desc: ‚ÄúBoyfriend‚Äù is a Shephard mix that has repeatedly bitten his owner‚Äôs boyfriend. Alfie is the aggressive English Bulldog of popular actress/television host Daisy Fuentes.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bam Bam
programme.desc: Cesar is called in to help a Pit Bull outgrow his puppy ways. A Chihuahua Mix terrorizes an older Mastiff and dominates the rest of the house. Cesar is called in to restore the balance of power.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Power of the Pack
programme.desc: The pack is a vital tool. In this intimate and revealing episode, witness some of the most memorable moments and experience the power of the pack.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Baby Girl
programme.desc: Suzie Dove Miles, a "cat whisperer," is set on getting a fearful Doberman mix at a shelter. Suzie has tried many of Cesar's exercises with Baby Girl, but needs Cesar‚Äôs expertise to help Baby Girl become a real dog.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Jonbee, Hudson & Violet, and Buford
programme.desc: A ferocious stray Jindo in desperate need of rescue, a Great Dane wreaks havoc on house and home, a boxer mourns the death of a beloved mate.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Peanut & Chico, Leroy Brown, and Tucker
programme.desc: Fighting Chihuahuas learn to get along. A dog with extreme attachment issues learns to relax. A couple‚Äôs border collie Tucker is obsessed with moving water, to a point that‚Äôs become dangerous.
programme.sub-title: Peanut & Chico, Leroy Brown, and Tucker

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Playboy Playmates
programme.desc: The Playboy Mansion in sunny Los Angeles is famous for raucous parties but it‚Äôs also home to Playboy founder, Hugh Hefner, some of his Playmates, and their dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Maya & Churchill
programme.desc: Churchill the Rottweiler is a well mannered dog, except when around other animals. Meanwhile, Maya, an affable Pit Bull, insists on being intimately involved in all operations of the household.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Ellie & J.J. and Oscar
programme.desc: Casey Anderson, star of Expedition Wild, and wife, actress Missi Pyle, seek help with their dog‚Äôs aggression toward other dogs. A rescued stray needs help conquering his fear of children.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Jersey Shore Dogs
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore is in for a dose of discipline when Cesar heads for the boardwalk to help three families deal with their out of control dog ‚Äòsituations.‚Äô

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Cesar and the Horse Whisperer (Chloe & Hobo, Ali)
programme.desc: Cesar enlists the help of Horse Whisperer Pat Parelli at a riding center that works with special needs people. A dog with separation anxiety exhibits extreme dog aggression.
programme.sub-title: Cesar and the Horse Whisperer (Chloe & Hobo, Ali)

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Trouble with Mummy
programme.desc: Bob is concerned when he hears that his mother's best friend Pearl has passed on.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Fly on the Wall
programme.desc: Feeling belittled by his family, Bob jumps at the chance to be the subject of a fly on the wall documentary.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Problems
programme.desc: At her clinic one-day, Margaret sees an old school chum, and invites her and her husband Matt to dinner.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair
programme.desc: When a patient dies of natural causes while in Bob's surgery, the local papers pick up the story?
programme.sub-title: A Patient Dies in Bob's Chair

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Cuckoo in the Nest
programme.desc: When Bobs old friend Clive, (who is a real drunken slob), is dumped by his wife, Bob lets him stay for a few days despite Margaret's objections?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A New Life
programme.desc: At a creepy chiropodist social night, Bob and Margaret encounter a couple who are rapturous about the new planned community where they now live.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Animal Behaviour
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret arrive home from another boring evening out with dreary friends, to find that their dogs behaviour has taken a turn for the worse?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Party Politics
programme.desc: Margaret runs into a distant friend who asks her to have an Ann Summers-type party in her home.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Going Dutch
programme.desc: Margaret enters a contest and wins the grand prize: a cycling tour of Holland!

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: My Foot Hurts
programme.desc: Margaret gets her own local call-in radio show entitled My Foot Hurts. On the first day, nervous and short on callers, she mentions her favourite curry house on the air?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: A Bob or Two
programme.desc: Bob buys an inexpensive painting from the neighbours at a junk sale (mostly motivated by pity since these neighbours have fallen on hard times) and hangs it in his surgery to brighten things up?

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Stranded in Toronto
programme.desc: When Bob and Margaret take a trip to New York, their flight is re-routed to Toronto due to a storm.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Strangers in a Strange Land
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret are mortified to discover that while they have been cooped up at Cookie and Melvin's house in Mississauga Ontario, their dogs have been left unattended by Penny, Bob's unreliable receptionist.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Margaret Gets a Job
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret have made the big move to Canada.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Til Death Do Us
programme.desc: Bob gets conned into buying a cemetery plot for Margaret as a surprise 15th wedding anniversary gift.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: The Wedding
programme.desc: Cookie and Melvin invite Bob and Margaret to the wedding of their goddaughter, Tiffany.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Fish at the Bat
programme.desc: Bob gets cajoled into joining his office softball team.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Over-Exposed
programme.desc: Margaret accidentally picks up her neighbour's photos at the pharmacy.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: Book Club
programme.desc: Bob and Margaret join a book club in the hopes of expanding their tiny social horizon.

programme.title: Bob and Margaret: On Location
programme.desc: A film crew sets up shop on Bob and Margaret's street, giving them a small and unsavory taste of fame and fortune.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Identity Crisis/U.S. Acres: The Bad Sport/Up a Tree
programme.desc: Garfield imitates dogs and mice./The gang plays "pig ball."/Garfield climbs a tree.
programme.sub-title: Identity Crisis/U.S. Acres: The Bad Sport/Up a Tree

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Weighty Problem/U.S. Acres: The Worm Turns/Good Cat, Bad Cat
programme.desc: Garfield tampers with the new talking scale./Booker's hunt for worms comes to a stop./Garfield's good and bad side battle for control.
programme.sub-title: Weighty Problem/U.S. Acres: The Worm Turns/Good Cat, Bad Cat

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Cabin Fever/U.S. Acres: Return of Power Pig/Fair Exchange

programme.sub-title: Cabin Fever/U.S. Acres: Return of Power Pig/Fair Exchange

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Binky Show/U.S. Acres: Keeping Cool/Don't Move!

programme.sub-title: The Binky Show/U.S. Acres: Keeping Cool/Don't Move!

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Magic Mutt/U.S. Acres: Short Story/Monday Misery
programme.desc: When Jon goes to an all-night magic shop./Booker is irritated by his height./Garfield attempts to defeat the evil day, Monday.
programme.sub-title: Magic Mutt/U.S. Acres: Short Story/Monday Misery

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Best of Breed/U.S. Acres: National Tapioca Pudding Day/All About Odie
programme.desc: Garfield and Nermal are the finalists in a big cat show./Roy invents a holiday./Garfield tries to lecture an audience about himself.
programme.sub-title: Best of Breed/U.S. Acres: National Tapioca Pudding Day/All About Odie

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Caped Avenger/U.S. Acres: Shy Fly Guy/Green Thumbs Down
programme.desc: Garfield dons the disguise of "the Caped Avenger."/Wade's fear of flying comes full throttle./Jon decides to grow his own food.
programme.sub-title: Caped Avenger/U.S. Acres: Shy Fly Guy/Green Thumbs Down

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Forget Me Not/U.S Acres: I Like Having You Around!/Sales Resistance

programme.sub-title: Forget Me Not/U.S Acres: I Like Having You Around!/Sales Resistance

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Pest of a Guest/Impractical Joker/Fat and Furry
programme.desc: Garfield finds competition from a mangy stray./Roy's jokes become so intolerable, that Orson fires the rooster./Garfield buys a winning lottery ticket and becomes a millionaire.
programme.sub-title: Pest of a Guest/Impractical Joker/Fat and Furry

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Rip Van Kitty/Grabbity/The Big Catnap

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Great Getaway/Scrambled Eggs/Hansel and Garfield
programme.desc: Jon tries to getaway by going to New York only to find Garfield stowed-away in his suitcase./Sheldon gets mixed up with a turtle egg./Garfield tries to entertain Nermal by telling him a fairy tail.
programme.sub-title: The Great Getaway/Scrambled Eggs/Hansel and Garfield

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Sludge Monster/Fortune Kooky/Heatwave Holiday
programme.desc: Jon, Garfield and Odie spend the night in a spooky hotel./Orson tries to convince Wade that fortune cookies aren't accurate./On a hot summer day, Garfield brings out the Christmas decorations.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: One Good Fern Deserves Another/The Goodie-Go-Round/Health Feud
programme.desc: Jon mistakenly buys a man-eating fern./Orson tries to get a record player for Bo./Jon becomes a health and exercise nut.
programme.sub-title: One Good Fern Deserves Another/The Goodie-Go-Round/Health Feud

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book
programme.desc: Garfield lectures a group about a famous water voyage./Orson imagines himself a famous secret agent./Jon gives Garfield his "little black book" to hide.
programme.sub-title: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Gets Cancelled/Show Stoppers/Cutie and the Beast
programme.desc: Binky the Clown loses his show and gets a job fixing up Jon's house./The farm's talent show is disrupted when Orson's brothers show./Nermal thinks it is no longer the "world's cutest kitten."
programme.sub-title: Binky Gets Cancelled/Show Stoppers/Cutie and the Beast

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: The Lasagna Zone/Sleepytime Pig/Yojumbo
programme.desc: When Garfield has an accident on the new satellite antennae, he ends up in the TV./Orson Can't get to sleep./Jon decides to learn karate.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Pros and Cons/Rooster Revenge/Lights! Camera! Garfield!
programme.desc: Garfield sets out to con a con./After an especially cruel trick Orson decides to get even with Roy./Garfield is spotted by famed film director Fredericko Fettucini.
programme.sub-title: Pros and Cons/Rooster Revenge/Lights! Camera! Garfield!

programme.title: On the Case: Race To Judgment
programme.desc: A late-night crash claims the lives of four girls. Texas community is torn apart in the search for justice.

programme.title: On the Case: Terrifying Connections
programme.desc: When a 15-year-old boy vanished under mysterious circumstances police feared the worst. It appeared the case had terrifying connections to a serial killer who had left a trail of bloodshed across the region.

programme.title: On the Case: Web of Torment
programme.desc: The abduction of a young mother from a crowded hospital parking lot is the beginning of a terrifying mystery that will torment her loved ones for decades.

programme.title: On the Case: Path of Destruction
programme.desc: When a 14 year old girl is murdered detectives must solve several terrifying crimes before they can bring her killer to justice.

programme.title: On the Case: Secrets From The Grave
programme.desc: After a teenager's partially nude body is discovered brutally beaten in a desolate cemetery, Investigators and her family face an emotional journey to the truth behind her murder

programme.title: On the Case: Half Way Home
programme.desc: The discovery of a woman's body inside an abandoned trailer leads to a 28-year search for the person responsible for her beating death.

programme.title: On the Case: The Day After Christmas
programme.desc: A man and his girlfriend are attacked by a mysterious intruder in their home. Despite near fatal wounds, she survives and helps investigators solve the crime.

programme.title: On the Case: A Mother's Nightmare
programme.desc: A young boy is murdered in his bed in the middle of the night. Police suspect the child's mother. Over the next 9 years there will be accusations, a confession and a conviction but will justice be served?

programme.title: On the Case: A Thin Disguise
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger ambushes a family as they pull into their driveway. Could the memories of a five year old girl be the key to solving the crime?

programme.title: On the Case: Twice Is No Accident
programme.desc: When Fran Smith mysteriously disappears her sister and daughter mount their own investigation... What they uncover sends police on a cross country man hunt for a killer.

programme.title: On the Case: A Window to Murder
programme.desc: A valiant teenager's dying act helps police solve the mystery behind her murder

programme.title: On the Case: Deadly Hymn
programme.desc: March 29th 1981. It was a warm Sunday afternoon in Mishawaka, Indiana when the mother of 28-year-old Gerry Gherardi received a disturbing call from the local priest. He informed her that Gerry, the church's organist did not show up to morning services.

programme.title: On the Case: Footprints and Whispers
programme.desc: A beloved husband and wife are found dead in their own home. Will the killers own words bring him to justice?

programme.title: On the Case: A Terrible Secret
programme.desc: A bed sheet may prove to be the key to solving the murder of a 13-year-old girl who is found strangled on a riverbank.

programme.title: On the Case: Tangled Web
programme.desc: A romantic Valentine's Day rendezvous ends in murder.

programme.title: On the Case: Unthinkable Harm
programme.desc: When a teenager is found savagely stabbed to death in her home, police hope a trail of blood found at the crime scene will lead them to her killer.

programme.title: On the Case: Haunting Memories
programme.desc: Twenty-year-old college student Kim Montelaro goes missing from a mall parking lot, then her lifeless body is found in a ravine five miles from the mall; investigators piece together the timeline of Montelaro's last moments alive and crack the case.

programme.title: On the Case: Long Walk, Cold Night
programme.desc: When a teenage girl is found murdered after a night out with friend, Police must retrace her final steps to find her killer.

programme.title: On the Case: Dirty Secrets
programme.desc: How did seventeen year old Joanna Rogers disappear from her home in the middle of the night? It was a question that baffled the investigators in Lubbock, TX. The mystery may have never been solved without the evidence found during another brutal murder...

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Remmy (Cleavant Derricks) finds himself with child when the Sliders land on a world where men carry babies for the last 20 weeks of gestation. With John Rhys-Davies.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (John Rhys-Davies, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks) find themselves in a world where Quinn (Jerry O'Connell) must settle a legal dispute on a televised game show. Guest star: Don Most.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (John Rhys-Davies, Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd and Cleavant Derricks) encounter a world where a master manipulator seemingly has created robots to replace human beings.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders visit a world where Christmas is purely commercial and malls house people. With John Rhys-Davies, Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd and Cleavant Derricks.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders visit a world where overworked and stressed-out people are sent to fantasy camps to improve their work output. Starring Jerry O'Connell, John Rhys-Davies, Sabrina Lloyd and Cleavant Derricks.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Arturo, Wade, Rembrandt and Quinn (John Rhys-Davies, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks, Jerry O'Connell) disturb a pyramid burial site, releasing a giant monster scarab and accidentally breaking the timer.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders land on a world where no one is over the age of 35, but soon realize the town's dirty secret. With Jerry O'Connell, John Rhys-Davies, Sabrina Lloyd and Cleavant Derricks.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders arrive in a world about to be destroyed by a star emitting intense radiation and can save only some of the people by sliding them. With John Rhys-Davies and Cleavant Derricks. Guest star: Roger Daltrey.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: One of the Sliders is lost during the mission to save a doomed world, while Arturo and Wade battle an egomaniacal military commander over who will be rescued. With John Rhys-Davies and Cleavant Derricks. Guest star: Roger Daltrey.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: A deadly virus turns a world's population into man-eating zombies, and when Quinn (Jerry O'Connell) is bitten, the other Sliders (Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks, Kari Wuhrer) frantically search for an antidote.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: While in a strange world, the Sliders discover a creature living inside Maggie (Kari Wuhrer) and attempting to reproduce.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: After landing on a world ravaged by earthquakes, Wade (Sabrina Lloyd) falls into a crevice and discovers a deserted city below the surface.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks, Kari Wuhrer) encounter an old friend while sheltered on a world covered with a suffocating fog.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Quinn and Rembrandt (Jerry O'Connell, Cleavant Derricks) get snared in a rare South American snake deal and wind up getting Maggie and Wade (Kari Wuhrer, Sabrina Lloyd) trapped during a rescue attempt.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks, Kari Wuhrer) return to the world where they lost Arturo, only to find the land terrorized by dinosaurs; Col. Rickman feeds off the settlers' DNA.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The lead singer of a rock band encourages Wade (Sabrina Lloyd) to join until Quinn (Jerry O'Connell) discovers the band members are vampires seeking to snatch the Sliders' timer. With Cleavant Derricks and Kari Wuhrer.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders (Jerry O'Connell, Sabrina Lloyd, Cleavant Derricks, Kari Wuhrer) land on a world where animal and human DNA have been fused by an evil scientist (Michael York), creating a civilization of carnivorous creatures.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: Quinn and Maggie track Remmy and Wade to Home World three months after being separated, but find the world has been conquered by the Kromaggs.

programme.title: Sliders
programme.desc: The Sliders get involved with a religious cult that plans to send them to another dimension.

programme.title: NEW EPISODE Sunshine Slayings
programme.desc: A young successful businessman leaves it all behind to travel the world. But when he falls out of contact, his family soon fear the worst. With no evidence or suspects, can investigators solve the mystery behind his whereabouts before it‚Äôs too late?

programme.title: NEW EPISODE Sunshine Slayings
programme.desc: Two Russian friends escape the harsh Siberian winter on a dream vacation in Thailand. But when the pair become targets of a deadly gunman, the dream turns into a nightmare.

programme.title: Killer Town: Athens, WI
programme.desc: Just outside the sleepy town of Athens, WI, Kenneth Kunz returns to his farm to find four of his family members murdered and one missing. Authorities begin an exhaustive search for his missing mother.

programme.title: Killer Town: Sparta, MI
programme.desc: The chief of police in Sparta, MI, leads an investigation into what happened to his family friend and babysitter Julia Dawson. Julia is reported missing when she doesn't come from Christmas shopping, and later her body is found beneath a snowbank.

programme.title: Killer Town: Jackson, MI
programme.desc: A young police officer follows his gut instincts to discover the macabre secret hidden in a friendly neighbourhood restaurant.

programme.title: Killer Town: Brandon, MB
programme.desc: When Erin Chorney disappears without a trace, investigators go to exceptional lengths to discover her whereabouts.

programme.title: Killer Town: Nashville, MI
programme.desc: Authorities find themselves at a standstill when a lack of evidence, motives, and suspects threatens to derail the investigation into the brutal killing of Rodney Fancher.

programme.title: Killer Town: Gormania, WV
programme.desc: Cathy Ford goes missing one fateful night and no one knows why, but a burnt car and blood soaked trailer might uncover the truth.

programme.title: Killer Town: Layland, WV
programme.desc: James Duncan‚Äôs family searches for him, but the atrocities of his murder are soon revealed and they are as shocking as who is behind his brutal death.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: John Sweeney
programme.desc: John Sweeney brutally murdered two of his girlfriends, dismembered their bodies and dumped them in canals. In a macabre twist, he hid clues in his abstract paintings, and five other girlfriends of his are currently still missing.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Garry Newlove
programme.desc: Garry Newlove‚Äôs wife Helen talks about the events on the night of his murder and the days afterwards, as well as her current work as a peer in the House of Lords combatting anti-social behaviour.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Shipman
programme.desc: Doctor Harold Shipman was convicted of killing 15 patients in 2000, but he is thought to have killed up to 215. Discover how he was eventually caught by detectives.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Wrongly Released

programme.title: Arthur: Buster Spaces Out/The Long Road Home
programme.desc: Inspired by footage of the moon landing, Buster wants to go to outer space someday! For now, it'd be cool to build and launch a rocket! Then, after costing Lakewood Elementary the win in a relay race, George wants to redeem himself.
programme.sub-title: Buster Spaces Out/The Long Road Home

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Plays The Blues/Buster's Sweet Success
programme.desc: Arthur's beloved piano teacher is retiring, but she assures him that the new teacher is outstanding--and famous, too! When Buster signs up to sell candy for the band, he figures it's easy money -- who doesn't love chocolate?
programme.sub-title: Arthur Plays The Blues/Buster's Sweet Success

programme.title: Arthur: Francine's Cleats of Strength/Little Miss Meanie
programme.desc: When Francine needs money for new soccer cleats, Muffy hires her as a personal assistant. Lydia and Muffy join forces to defeat a mean beauty queen in the Little Miss Crocus" pageant.
programme.sub-title: Francine's Cleats of Strength/Little Miss Meanie

programme.title: Arthur: Home Sweet Home/Do You Believe in Magic
programme.desc: It‚Äôs time to celebrate summer! Join Arthur as he takes a family vacation and visits Grandpa Dave‚Äôs farm. Then, Arthur, D.W. and Buster spend a few days at the beach where they discover the simple joys of building sandcastles!
programme.sub-title: Home Sweet Home/Do You Believe in Magic

programme.title: Arthur: Postcards from Buster, Parts I & II
programme.desc: Buster's going to New York City to meet his dad Bo, and the Reads are coming with him! He's thrilled ... but won't his mom miss him? But, Bitzi gives him a present that will let him share his exciting trip with her--a video camera!
programme.sub-title: Postcards from Buster, Parts I & II

programme.title: Arthur: Room to Ride/The Frensky Family Fiasco
programme.desc: With Lance Armstrong‚Äôs support, Binky and his friends take to the streets to convince residents to vote for new bike safety lanes. Francine wants the Frenskys to be closer, but a weekly Family Night turns out to be harder than expected.
programme.sub-title: Room to Ride/The Frensky Family Fiasco

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. Rides Again/Arthur Makes The Team
programme.desc: In D.W.‚Äôs heart lurks one big, gnawing desire--TO GET RID OF THOSE TRAINING WHEELS! Then, can Coach Frensky work with a baseball team where everyone is fighting about who gets to be pitcher and no one wants to practice?
programme.sub-title: D.W. Rides Again/Arthur Makes The Team

programme.title: Arthur: D.W. on Ice/Spoiled Rotten!
programme.desc: D.W. tells her friends that she's a fantastic skater, but she can barely stand on ice! With a skating party coming up, how will she face everyone and tell them the truth? Accused of being spoiled, Muffy sets out to prove her friends wrong.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Weighs In/The Law of the Jungle Gym
programme.desc: When Arthur doesn't fit into his costume for the play, he's shocked to learn that he's gotten "husky-sized." He gets serious about getting in shape. Muffy found the perfect place to take pictures with her new digital camera: the jungle gym.
programme.sub-title: Arthur Weighs In/The Law of the Jungle Gym

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Tooth/D.W. Gets Lost
programme.desc: It's bad enough to wear glasses all the time. But does Arthur have to be the last person in his class to lose his baby teeth? Then, if you think being lost in a humongous department store would scare a four-year-old, think again.

programme.title: Arthur: The Last Day (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: It's a time of change at Lakewood Elementary as Arthur and Buster move up to 4th grade. D.W. and Bud prepare to enter kindergarten and Muffy and Francine contemplate how spending the summer away from each other will affect their friendship.

programme.title: Arthur: D.W.'s Deer Friend/Buster Hits the Books

programme.sub-title: Arthur vs. The Very Mean Crossing Guard/D.W.'s Very Bad Mood

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: U-Boat War
programme.desc: U-boats posed the deadliest threat to Allied convoys traveling the Atlantic.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: After a careful campaign of disinformation that throws the German defenders off-guard, the Western Allies finally land on Normandy.France is liberated.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Western Allies secure supply routes that will allow them to enter Germany, and the Ardennes counter-offensive fails. The Red Army advances rapidly. The SS implements the Holocaust.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: The Marines succeed in the "island hopping" strategy against suicidal resistance. The US Navy establishes supremacy, cutting off Japan.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: In 1945, Germany is crumbly on both fronts. The Western Allies cross the Rhine and take most of Germany, while the Red Army quickly advances into Berlin. After Hitler's suicide, Germany surrenders and is divided among the allied powers.

programme.title: World War II in HD Color
programme.desc: Japan continues its suicidal resistance, and invading it looks costly. After 2 atomic bombs, the Emperor intervenes and stops the War. Stalin grabs territory in East Asia. The War is over, and the Atomic Era and the Cold War start.

programme.title: VE Day - Forever in their Debt
programme.desc: Tells the stories of those who experienced the end of the war in all its many forms. It features a wide range of interviews from children who remember the street parties, to the servicemen who remember not having to buy a single drink that day.

programme.title: Voices of D-Day Landings
programme.desc: In the early hours of June 6th, 1944 Allied forces began the greatest military assault ever attempted. They came to Normandy by both air and sea with one objective.

programme.title: I Have Never Forgotten You
programme.desc: I Have Never Forgotten You provides an intimate portrait of famed Nazi hunter and humanitarian, Simon Wiesenthal. This rare biography looks closely at the sacrifices made by one of history's bravest and boldest.

programme.title: Field of Valor
programme.desc: It was becoming clear in 1939 that direct U.S. involvement in World War Two was only a matter of time. Training approximately 500 to 750 pilots a year, the United States Army Air Corps was severely outmatched by the warring powers of Europe and Asia.

programme.title: Boy Soldiers Of World War II
programme.desc: In Britain during World War Two, thousands of men over the age of 18 were conscripted into the army, but among them were hundreds of underage boys, some as young as 15, who lied about their age so that they could join up.

programme.title: Brothers In Arms
programme.desc: The young men who joined up together, fought together and died together in World War One.

programme.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
programme.desc: Tells the story of 19 men and women who were there. Through a series of filmed interviews their stories have been preserved, allowing them to tell the part they played in the nation's defence in their own words creating a unique collection of accounts.

programme.title: Battle of Britain: The Race For Radar
programme.desc: On the brink of war the Germans mount a daring Zeppelin spy mission. Had the Luftwaffe spies discovered Britain‚Äôs greatest secret?'

programme.title: Blitz the Aftermath
programme.desc: With interviews and archive footage showing the sheer amount of devastation ‚Äì from the loss of life to the immense damage caused to buildings across the country - The Aftermath looks at how the Blitz changed the face of Britain's cities and lives.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Devil's Twin
programme.desc: Identical twin brothers suspected of committing a murder after studying a crime show on TV.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Amanda Knox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of Amanda Knox, an American exchange student who was convicted, along with her Italian boyfriend, Raffaelle Sollecito, of murdering Amanda‚Äôs British roommate, Meredith Kercher in 2007.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in L.A.
programme.desc: Focuses on two California couples: the Adairs and the Shapiros. Mindy Shapiro discovered that her husband Michael, an orthopedic surgeon, was having an affair with Jeanie Adair, and in 1996, after 11 years of marriage, the couple opted for divorce.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 1
programme.desc: A report on the 1994 murders of the Rafay family -- Sultana Rafay, her husband Tariq and their autistic daughter, Basma -- focusing on the pursuit and arrest of the two suspects: Atif Rafay, the only surviving family member, and his friend Sebastian Burns

programme.title: 48 Hours: Perfectly Executed - Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2 focuses on the role of the Canadian Mounted Police in the investigation and sting operation put in place to obtain confessions from Rafay and Burns. Having taken refuge in Canada, Rafay and Burns were extradited to Seattle to face murder charges.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the 1960 murder of Irena Garza, in McAllen, Texas, and the efforts that family members and police have taken to bring the suspect, a Roman Catholic priest, to trial for the crime.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Babysitter
programme.desc: Chris Routh, a responsible 14-year-old honor student loved children and earned money as a babysitter.. On July 25, 2001, Emily a child in his care suddenly stopped breathing. Was this a case of murder, an accident, or natural causes. Police investigate.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: In September 1999, Brian Eftenoff of Phoenix, Az. Was convicted of murdering his wife, Judi. It was alleged that Eftenoff forced more than a gram of cocaine down his wife‚Äôs throat causing her to die of a cocaine-induced stroke.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Hell and Back
programme.desc: An interview with 17-year-old Jacque Marris who reveals new details about her abduction and how she and Tamara Brooks, another teenage victim, survived a harrowing 12-hour kidnapping on Aug. 1, 2002.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Murder in the Hamptons
programme.desc: A report on the October 2001 murder of Wall Street tycoon Ted Ammon who was embroiled in a bitter divorce battle with his wife Generosa who later died of breast cancer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Terror at the Morgue
programme.desc: Dr. O.C. Smith, a medical examiner, was apparently attacked on June 1, 2002, as he was leaving work. He was found wrapped in barbed wire with a bomb strapped to his neck. Dr. Smith survived but expressed concern that his assailant might attack again

programme.title: 48 Hours: Where's Our Baby?
programme.desc: In November 1997, Marlene and Steve Aisenberg reported their five-month-old daughter Sabrina missing from her crib. Police soon focused on the parents as authorities became convinced that they knew more about the baby‚Äôs disappearance than they admitted.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Web of Seduction

programme.title: 48 Hours: Every Picture Tells A Story

programme.title: 48 Hours: Secrets of the Well
programme.desc: Reports on two separate unsolved murders with strange similarities, both solved by Georgia criminal investigator Clay Bryant. 1) a report on the murder case of Gwendolyn Moore 2) The disappearance of fire chief Fred Wilkerson.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders
programme.desc: A report on the investigation into the murders of Greg and Bernadette Ohlemacher in 2005. The Albuquerque, New Mexico couple had been shot dead in their home
programme.sub-title: A Daughter, A Mortgage, and Two Murders

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: A report on the 2009 death of Rhonda Casto, who went hiking in Oregon‚Äôs Columbia River Gorge with her boyfriend, Stephen Nichols, and she never returned home.

programme.title: 48 Hours: To Catch a Stalker
programme.desc: Fifteen-year-old Penny Chang of Shaker Heights, Ohio was stalked and killed by her older brother‚Äôs best friend, 21-year-old Scott Strothers.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Perfect Family
programme.desc: A young man is on trial for the murder of his mother.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Trek

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bank

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Operation Heart

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Slave pt. 1

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Slave pt. 2

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Widow

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Money Machine

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Seal
programme.desc: America's relations with Kuala Rokat, a small neutral country on the China-India border, are threatened when a priceless national treasure, a carved jade seal, is stolen and bought by American art collector, J. Richard Taggart.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Sweet Charity

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Council pt. 1

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Contender, Pt. 1

programme.desc: Cinnamon is captured and the enemy discovers the one thing that would unmask her identity and expose the Impossible Mission Force.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Bargain

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends

programme.desc: Baby Bop's blankey seems to be getting smaller. But Barney shows her that Baby Bop is growing. Barney and his friends help Riff see the dentist is nothing to be afraid of.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When Baby Bop thinks the half-moon is somehow broken, Barney and Friends take an imaginary visit to the moon where Barney eases her concerns.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is sad because she lost her pet caterpillar, Monty. Barney and the others try to help her find it./Barney and Baby Bop are thrilled when BJ sets up a bug zoo in the caboose.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Big Garden - Get Happy
programme.desc: Baby Bop wants Barney, BJ and the kids to play with her instead of working in their garden. They promise to play with her as soon as they finish. Baby Bop can't wait, and tries many ways to get them to come play with her now, none of which work.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: When several sports balls suddenly disappear without a trace, it‚Äôs detective BJ to the rescue as he dons trenchcoat and fedora.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: As he watches birds fly overhead, Riff begins to daydream of flying himself. After seeing all the Moms playing with their kids in the Park, Baby Bop wonders what makes somebody a Mommy.

programme.desc: Barney and the kids help Mr. Boyd prepare his dog Bingo for a trip to the veterinarian for a check, while learning lessons about caring for dogs at the same time. Meanwhile, BJ is searching for his missing baseball, which he suspects was buried by Bingo.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Ryan tries to be just like Barney but soon learns that he is special when he's being himself! Barney explains to Baby Bop that the word "no" can help you avoid making mistakes or getting hurt.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: You Can Count on Me
programme.desc: Barney helps his friends discover just how fun numbers can be by taking them on a number hunt in the park. Baby Bop delights in sharing her favorite number and the kids discover that numbers can be found everywhere.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Grace‚Äôs food drive isn‚Äôt going very well until Melanie offers to help. Melanie comes up with the perfect idea to get people to donate ‚Äì put on a movie premiere in the caboose!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is surprised by the first day of cold weather, Barney helps her see that winter is a wonderful time. On a hot summer day, Barney teaches BJ about all the activities you can do in the summer.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Imagine That!
programme.desc: While Baby Bop and BJ are pretending to be pirates, Barney creates a magical island for their fantastic adventure. Together they discover ways to have fun while playing dress up, pretending, and being silly.

programme.desc: Barney takes the kids to Hawaii on a quest for a bird of paradise. While there, they meet some friends, learn new Hawaiian words, make a Hawaiian lei and dance a hula! Eventually, Barney and his friends find a bird of paradise.
programme.sub-title: A Bird of a Different Feather

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Go For A Ride!
programme.desc: Barney and the children have fun playing with and learning about busses and cars.
