programme.desc: A special project provides the perfect opportunity for Barney, Baby Bop and BJ to learn about love and relationships the "heart" way as they make a "Friends and Family Tree."

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Layla and her friends celebrate her birthday in the park with foods that aren‚Äôt traditionally American.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Once Upon a Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Mario is trying to write his very own fairy tale. The children help by acting out some of their favorite fairy tales to give Mario some ideas.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Pistachio - BJ Snack Attack
programme.desc: Barney is snacking on pistachios...and just can't seem to stop! His young friends try to help by hiding them from Barney. When that doesn't work, they tell him a story to help him stop eating pistachios.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Bunches of Boxes!
programme.desc: A day of imaginative play and fun for Barney and his young friends is kicked off by the arrival of a variety of boxes from the "Enjoy-Your-Toys Company." Surprisingly, every box is empty!

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Keep On Truckin'
programme.desc: Barney's friends Baby Bop and BJ learn about trucks as they wheel out their favorites and explore the functions and purposes of various trucks. BJ likes helping with his tow truck and Barney helps them see what it's like to be a real truck driver.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Splish! Splash!
programme.desc: A "too hot" afternoon becomes a "totally cool" day when Barney introduces his friends to the wonders of water.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Let's Play Games!
programme.desc: It's fun and games with Barney and his friends! BJ's favorite way of getting exercise is by playing sports and games. When Baby Bop is shy about trying new games, Barney and his friends show her how tee-rific trying something new can be.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton-Geons & Dragons
programme.desc: While Ton soups up their new truck, Allen heads to an auction solo and encounters Carolyn and CJ. There he discovers LARP weaponry, a sword collection, and falconry gear, before Ton reveals their new ride: Betty.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Choo-Choo, Cha-Ching!
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get a surprise second chance after nearly getting shut out in the small town of Palmer. They uncover a motorized railroad maintenance car from the 1960's and a pre-WWI Japanese semi-automatic pistol.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Diesel Digs
programme.desc: The guys head to the industrial hub of LA to score some heavy machinery and unearth a 1981 Bobcat 743 Frontloader, one of the first powered by a diesel engine and a trench-defending WWI German Sturmtrupp helmet bashing mace.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Big Sis Ducks Out
programme.desc: Big Sis drops some bad news as the guys clash with Carolyn over a carnival unit at an auction in Long Beach. Ton and Allen unearth a Native American tomahawk, a dunk tank and a rare gun that can fire three shots at once.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Home on the Gun Range
programme.desc: Barely making it to an auction in Corona, CA, Allen and Ton buy an overstuffed unit and find an antique crossbow, a rare 10-gauge Winchester shotgun and a 1940s Kiss-o-Meter.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gold 'n' Gloves
programme.desc: The Auction Hunters team goes toe-to-toe with Ton's evil twin! They find a medieval catapult designed for storming castles and Ton uncovers a hidden collection of gold bars worth thousands of dollars!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: Ton and Allen duke it out with a local thrift store gang at a Brooklyn storage auction. The guys discover a classic arcade redemption game and a mid-century water cannon designed to fight towering infernos!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Pucks for Bucks
programme.desc: The guys get stuck with a unit they didn't want and have to sort through trash to make their bottom line. They uncover glass blowing tools, autographed baseballs and a hockey puck launcher, which puts Ton in the line of fire.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Nothing But Net
programme.desc: Ton and Allen face their toughest challenge yet when two old rivals join forces. The guys dig up an off-road motorcycle and a pair of net guns, while the staff clashes with mystery shoppers back at Haff Ton Pawn.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fire in the Hole!
programme.desc: 1930s "blasting machine" dynamite detonator box; 1890s treasure chest with secret compartments. Ton smelts jewelry to forge bricks of silver.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Bowling Pin Payday
programme.desc: Allen & Ton visit Ton's old stompin' ground and go head-to-head with a trash-talking auction buyer. They uncover a 19th century rifle with a matching cutlass bayonet and a mechanical bowling pinsetter from the early 1960's!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Wild West
programme.desc: Allen and Ton explain their strategies at a storage auction in San Bernardino, win two units, then have a Pepperbox gun and vintage Lionel train set appraised by experts.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ramped Up
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go head-to-head with their former assistant, Carolyn, while Ton battles a bad back. The guys discover an automatic BB gun and, when negotiations to sell a stunt ramp go south, Allen faces a tough decision.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Wreck-Shaw
programme.desc: Allen drags a starving Ton to a weekend auction and some newbie buyers try to eat up all the profit. Will a rickshaw, a wrecking ball, and blast detonators be enough to satisfy Ton's appetite, or will the guys go home hungry?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ice, Ice, Baby
programme.desc: Ton and Allen have to get aggressive when they encounter a towering opponent with a mountain of cash. The guys uncover a vintage ice resurfacing machine and an Olympic biathlon rifle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Everything's Bigger in Texas
programme.desc: Winchester 1886 rifle invented to kill buffalo; collection of 1950s electric Slot Cars.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Early Bird Special
programme.desc: Vintage Shooting Star carnival game; professional Mixed Martial Arts octagon fighting cage.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Trading Places
programme.desc: When an injury sidelines Allen, he stays at the shop while Ton takes Big Sis to the auction and goes rogue, ignoring Allen's advice and making risky purchases that could lose the partners a boatload of cash.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Catch My Drift?
programme.desc: The guys land a custom drift car and a luxury antiques unit that could have a one-of-a-kind pilot pistol from WWI. While trying to track down the provenance of the gun, Ton's lead foot gets them into trouble at their car sale.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Whiskey Business
programme.desc: An auction in Allen's old stomping grounds triggers memories of being a "lone wolf." The guys find a set of RC race boats and when they buy a man-cave unit full of old whiskey, a night of partying leads to some tough sales.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Reel Money
programme.desc: 1970's-era Fighting Chair used for big-game fishing; military MILES "laser tag" training system.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Chicago Grand Slam
programme.desc: 1984 Yamaha SS440 Snowmobile that introduced the revolutionary shock absorber suspension; rare autographed 1920s baseball glove; mint Hank Aaron signed baseball; authentic 1950s Robby the Robot collector toy.

programme.desc: Allen heads to an auction with Elle, while Ton and Big Sis revamp the shop to help bring in more customers. Allen unearths a Ouija board and a set of antique basketballs, and goes toe-to-toe with an NBA Hall of Famer.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks

programme.title: Auction Hunters: To Pawn or Not To Pawn

programme.sub-title: To Pawn or Not To Pawn

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash

programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.

programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Uncharted Territory
programme.desc: The Atlantic Bluefin are starting to migrate out of New England waters, so the Gloucester fleet races to find any edge they can, but will their risky new strategies pay off?

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Twice Bitten
programme.desc: With only two weeks left on the North Atlantic Bluefin tuna fishing season, just one fish is not enough for the Gloucester captains ‚Äì and the lure of doubling their luck is overpowering.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Money On The Line
programme.desc: In the first episode of a two-part season finale, Gloucester's reigning Bluefin champion Dave Carraro, of FV-tuna.com, starts the fishing season with a $20,000 lead over his rival.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Endgame
programme.desc: With only three days left in the North Atlantic Bluefin Tuna season, the captains of Gloucester race against each other - and an oncoming storm - in the battle to land their final fish of the season.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Wicked Return
programme.desc: The fishermen of Gloucester, Massachusetts, set out for Jeffrey's Ledge in hopes of catching the first fish of the North Atlantic Bluefin Tuna Season.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Checkmate
programme.desc: It's week two of the North Atlantic Blue Fin Tuna Season and the Gloucester captains and their crews, from rookies to old pros, get put to the test.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Into The Storm
programme.desc: Bad weather threatens to end the fishing week for the Gloucester fishermen, but while some boats head for home, others decide to take on Mother Nature's wrath.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Operation T.U.N.A
programme.desc: As the hunt for blue fin tuna intensifies, the fisherman resort to espionage for information.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bite Fight
programme.desc: It's the fifth week of the season and the entire fleet battle for the most successful fishing spots.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Mission: Fishin!
programme.desc: As Gloucester's Bluefin tuna fleet charges into the heart of the fishing season, it's a tight race for the coveted title of top-earning boat.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bad Latitude
programme.desc: It's almost halfway through the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season and the Gloucester fleet has hit a lull in fishing.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Battle Royale
programme.desc: With the second half of the North Atlantic bluefin tuna fishing season now underway, competition amongst the Gloucester fleet intensifies when tuna become scarce.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Brotherly Shove
programme.desc: A new week calls for new techniques as the Gloucester Captains try unconventional methods to hook their next paycheck.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Blue Grit
programme.desc: Time is running out in the North Atlantic bluefin tuna season and, this week, every boat in the Gloucester fleet is facing a different challenge.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Tuna Beta Kappa
programme.desc: The tuna fishermen of Gloucester, Massachusetts, know that they have to rely on each other to get the job done, but sometimes trusting the competition isn't such a good idea.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Bad Blood
programme.desc: Three weeks left of bluefin tuna season, the Gloucester fleet is desperate to haul in a monster.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: Sharks and Recreation
programme.desc: With only three weeks left in the North Atlantic Bluefin Tuna season, the pressure begins to take a toll on the captains.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Mighty Bite
programme.desc: With only two weeks left in the fishing season and the price of blue fin tuna on the rise, the Gloucester captains race to bring in record hauls.

programme.title: Wicked Tuna: The Reckoning
programme.desc: There is only one week of fishing left in the North Atlantic Bluefin Tuna season and the Gloucester fleet is set for a final showdown in a bid to catch the last monster tuna of the year.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Deadly Storms
programme.desc: It‚Äôs up to Dr. G to determine if alcohol was to blame for a man's death or if there was a silent killer lurking in his body.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: Dr. Farley discusses the bizarre case of a pregnant mother who suddenly dies. As the autopsy unfolds, Dr. Farley uncovers information that could have saved her and her unborn child‚Äôs life.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: On The Run
programme.desc: Teenagers stumble across a horrifying car fire on the side of a desolate stretch of roadway. When the police arrive, they pull severely burned human remains from the driver‚Äôs seat.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Fatal Encounters
programme.desc: Keith Douglas is met with a barrage of bullets as he opens his door. The police are looking to Dr. G for hard evidence to link certain suspects to the murder.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Disturbing Behavior
programme.desc: Leo Guzman falls off a ladder while painting a house. At first, his death seems to be an open-and-shut case but, as the autopsy unfolds, Dr. G believes there may be more to this case.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: A Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: It‚Äôs an early Sunday morning when a local resident decides to take a shortcut through the church parking lot. Walking past a lone car, the resident can‚Äôt believe his eyes.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: One False Move
programme.desc: All circumstances point to foul play in the case of a dead hunter and the police fear that a killer is on the loose. Dr. G must provide them with answers before there are more victims.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: The Desperate Crossing
programme.desc: A quadriplegic woman loved by her community is found dead in an Orlando park 150ft from her motorized wheelchair. Children find her lifeless body face down in the sand.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner: Fighting for the Truth
programme.desc: An employee is found dead in a restaurant kitchen. Clues found near the body include an empty cash register, a knife, and a trail of blood splotches leading to a vandalized car in the parking lot.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files
programme.desc: Fake celebrity clairvoyant Williams preyed on the elderly by performing fake readings, including one where he directed his client to a forged will.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files: Robert Hyams ‚Äì The Suspect Scientist
programme.desc: Hyams posed as a leading scientist and millionaire art buyer before fleeing to California where he posed as a leading academic.

programme.title: Conmen Case Files: Michael Hammond ‚Äì The Fantasist Con
programme.desc: He posed as a playboy, a detective, a top surgeon, millionaire property developer, royal confident and boyfriend of Renee Zellweger.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Model Killer
programme.desc: A gorgeous young model is bludgeoned to death in her downtown apartment. The wounds to her head are so severe police initially presume she's been shot.

programme.title: 72 Hours: The Saint
programme.desc: A frat boy lures a girl to his house with the promise of a party, but once there it turns out he has ulterior motives. When the girl says no, he violently attacks her. A string of violence is finally uncovered, revealing a sinister trail of violence.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Evil Eyes
programme.desc: A dead woman is found in a park. It‚Äôs learned the deceased is a divorced landlady of a group home for transients. The suspect list is long; the clues to follow are few.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Danger in the Woods
programme.desc: Three teenagers accompany a deliveryman to a densely wooded area for a drinking party that, before long, becomes a nightmare. Things take a terrifying turn when one of teens attacks the others.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Thrill Kill
programme.desc: When a senior citizen is killed on a city street, authorities at first treat it as a typical hit-and-run accident. But as they investigate further, they begin to realize that the culprit is a thrill-seeking psychopath.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Faith Healer
programme.desc: A trucker at a roadside rest station discovers the fully clothed body of a dead East Indian woman.

programme.title: 72 Hours: The Game
programme.desc: 1995 - Houston, Texas. A lonely man calls a dating service and gets more than he bargained for when he is met at gunpoint and robbed by his ‚Äúdates‚Äù. The women, dubbed ‚ÄúThelma & Louise‚Äù, lure men with the promise of sex but then drug and rob them.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Kidnapped
programme.desc: A wealthy Asian girl is kidnapped in Vancouver. When the kidnappers make the fateful error of using the young girl‚Äôs cell phone, police are able to track their movements and capture the assailants.

programme.title: 72 Hours: Lone Wolf
programme.desc: Two murders of mothers in their own homes send shock-waves through a normally quiet and friendly town where everybody leaves their doors unlocked. The crimes go unsolved until twenty-eight years later.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: Death Trap On the Road (Schaaf Case)
programme.desc: A damaged bike belonging to Karine Schaaff, 16, is found abandoned by the side of a road in Moselle.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers: The Strange Farm: The Ana√Øs Guillaume Affair
programme.desc: On the night of April 16, 2013, Ana√Øs Guillaume, 21, mysteriously disappears in Fromy (Ardennes) after spending the evening at her companion's farm.
programme.sub-title: The Strange Farm: The Ana√Øs Guillaume Affair

programme.title: Targeted For Murder: A Deadly Affair
programme.desc: When blue-collar worker Lyle Kopenkoskey is found dead down a secluded country road, investigators race against the clock to uncover the grisly truth behind the cold-blooded crime.

programme.title: Targeted For Murder: Sex, Lies, And Murder
programme.desc: When a wholesome family woman is gunned down outside her church after choir practice, police uncover a network of corruption and illicit sex lie just below a flawless surface.

programme.title: Targeted For Murder: Killer Walking
programme.desc: A carjacking murder is far more than it appears when police piece together surveillance videos and track the killer who parked the car and walked away.

programme.title: Surviving Evil: Bullet Proof
programme.desc: A Texas schoolteacher is abducted in the middle of the night by a gun-toting stranger with a sinister plan. Meanwhile, an Ottawa woman‚Äôs casual dating experience proves anything but when her former lover shows up with a gun and a deadly promise.

programme.title: Surviving Evil: Hostage Hell House
programme.desc: A pretty college student working as a bartender in suburban Illinois, Katy Sharp is saving up for her upcoming move to Nashville when she is kidnapped and held hostage by a drug-dealing psychopath who enjoys torturing his victims.

programme.title: Murder in the Family: Sean Combs
programme.desc: Exploring who killed Melvin Combs and how the event of losing his dad propelled young Sean forward.

programme.title: Murder in the Family: Donatella Versace
programme.desc: Designer Donatella Versace's world in 1997 spins out of control when her brother Gianni is murdered.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Elusive Rapist
programme.desc: In the winter of 1968, the prairie city of Saskatoon is ravaged by a string of savage rapes.

programme.title: Crime Stories: Allan Legere: The Monster of Miramichi
programme.desc: In 1989, the entire town of Miramichi is held hostage by a monster. A troubled man with a heinous past embarks on a 7-month crime spree, including brutal beatings, rape, arson and serial murder.
programme.sub-title: Allan Legere: The Monster of Miramichi

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Human Hunter
programme.desc: Robert C. Hansen was known for his hunting abilities. In the early 1980s, however, his taste for hunting took a sinister turn.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Abducted Atheists
programme.desc: American Atheist Madalyn Murray O'Hair and her family vanished in August 1995, leaving behind an ominous note.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Boardinghouse Killer
programme.desc: Dorothea Puente provided shelter for the infirm in her boardinghouse. It wasn't until a body was found in her yard that authorities realized she was not who she appeared to be.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Russians Are Killing
programme.desc: It is just another meeting for Los Angeles real estate developer Meyer Muscatel. Unfortunately Muscatel meets with a Russian immigrant with murderous intent.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Backpacker Killer
programme.desc: In the early 1990s, the tourist hotspot of New South Wales, Australia became a place of fear when backpackers started going missing.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Homicidal Handyman
programme.desc: In Sacramento in the mid 1980s, a ruthless killer was making his way through the fringe community of Oak Park.

programme.title: Crime Stories: A Way with Murder
programme.desc: Nancy, David and Susan Spangler are found shot to death in their home - the brutal slaughter is deemed a murder suicide.

programme.title: Crime Stories: The Homocidal Drifter
programme.desc: In the city of Moncton, New Brunswick police discover the bodies of Joan Hicks and her 11-year-old daughter, Nina ‚Äö√Ñ√¨ both brutally murdered late in the night.

programme.title: Crime Stories: Terror by Text
programme.desc: On a wintry morning in Sweden, Alexandra Fossmo, wife of pastor Helge Fossmo, was found shot to death in her bed.

programme.desc: A mum breastfeeding her baby on the move rattles Essex biker cop Steve Clements and Lucy Watson is called as back-up to help deal with a man who‚Äôs reported to have been wielding an axe.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 4

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 5
programme.desc: Biker paramedic Mark Hayes has to deal with an aggressivedrunk in the city centre and a young woman with epilepsy who's had several seizures. Biker cops in Essex are on a special night op hunting illegal road users.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 6
programme.desc: In the final show of this run, Birmingham biker paramedics Steve Harris and Mark Hayes race to bring a man back to life. Essex biker cops crack down on death-trap wheels and a learner driver gets more than she expected.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 9
programme.desc: The emergency bikers race to help a Birmingham toddler who‚Äôs in agony after a nasty fall and a woman struggling to breathe in Oxford. In Essex, biker cop Lucy Watson finds herself on the end of a charm assault and in North Yorkshire.

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 10

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 2

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 3

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 4

programme.title: Emergency Bikers: Episode 5

programme.title: Scorpion: Charades
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is tasked with uncovering a mole inside the CIA whose judgment is clouded by matters of the heart and is being coerced into stealing deadly chemicals.

programme.title: Scorpion: Forget Me Nots
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must jog the memory of an injured former Secret Service agent who is their only hope of preventing weapons of mass destruction being launched from a secret U.S. nuclear silo.

programme.title: Scorpion: Love Boat
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover on a cruise ship to locate and disable deadly stolen rockets.

programme.title: Scorpion: Going South
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Mexico when a tech billionaire hires them to rescue his kidnapped daughter.

programme.title: Scorpion: Once Bitten, Twice Die
programme.desc: When a conflict in Eastern Europe threatens to escalate, Team Scorpion is called on to help facilitate secret peace talks to prevent World War III.

programme.title: Scorpion: Young Hearts Spark Fire
programme.desc: While on a mission to save lost hikers, Team Scorpion's helicopter crashes, igniting a massive wildfire that quickly closes in on them.

programme.title: Scorpion: Crossroads
programme.desc: To protect a key witness who is en route to testifying against a deadly drug cartel, Team Scorpion takes her on the run, with the cartel hot on their heels.

programme.title: Scorpion: Cliffhanger
programme.desc: Walter finally learns Cabe's long-kept secret regarding the Baghdad mission, and it threatens to tear Team Scorpion apart forever.

programme.title: Scorpion: Postcards From the Edge
programme.desc: Scorpion, torn apart and uncertain about their future as a team, must come together for their most important mission yet to save Walter's life as his car teeters on the side of a cliff.

programme.title: Scorpion: Satellite Of Love
programme.desc: The new Director of Homeland Security reunites the team when a nuclear powered Russian satellite is knocked out of orbit and must be diverted before it detonates over Southern California.

programme.title: Scorpion: Cuba Libre
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Cuba when a woman from Cabe's past pleads for him to help catch a Serbian war criminal.

programme.title: Scorpion: Fish Filet
programme.desc: In order to save the lives of three judges, Sylvester goes undercover in federal prison but Team Scorpion must break him out when his life is threatened. Kevin Weisman guest stars.

programme.title: Scorpion: Fractured
programme.desc: After a powerful earthquake rocks Los Angeles, Team Scorpion must fix a pinched gas line to prevent a massive explosion.

programme.title: Scorpion: Adaptation
programme.desc: While Team Scorpion works to stop an influx of drugs being smuggled into the country via drones, Walter gives Happy and Toby an ultimatum on their new relationship.

programme.title: Scorpion: The Fast & The Nerdiest
programme.desc: After Sylvester scores big on THE PRICE IS RIGHT, Team Scorpion must infiltrate a high-end car smuggling operation about to ship bioweapons to South America.

programme.title: Scorpion: Ticker
programme.desc: When Los Angeles' blood supply is hacked and deemed unusable because of fear it's been tainted, Team Scorpion must find the culprit.

programme.title: Scorpion: Djibouti Call
programme.desc: While on a secret mission in Djibouti, Africa, with his new Homeland protege, Tim Armstrong (Scott Porter), Cabe is captured and Team Scorpion must save him.

programme.title: Scorpion: Twist And Shout
programme.desc: Team Scorpion's mission to recover the remains of fallen Marines in Vietnam is threatened along with their lives when a deadly tornado heads directly towards them.

programme.title: Scorpion: Hard Knox
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is hired by the Department of Defense to break into Fort Knox and "steal" a precious artifact in order to test their security.

programme.title: Scorpion: Chernobyl Intentions
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes to Chernobyl to repair the decaying nuclear reactor before a catastrophic meltdown.

programme.title: Scorpion: Toby Or Not Toby
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must out-think their unstable ex-Scorpion member after he kidnaps Toby and threatens to kill him unless his cunning demands are met.

programme.title: Transformers: Cybertron: End
programme.desc: Optimus approaches Galvatron to take the Omega Lock and Planet Keys. However, Galvatron is drawing out the power of the Planet Keys, and Thundercracker, Thunderblast, Ransack, and Crumplezone grow to giant size.

programme.title: Transformers: Cybertron: Unfinished
programme.desc: Galvatron who is worn out and without power wanders through the universe. At that time, something shining catches his eye. The voice of Starscream is heard and asks "Have You Given Up?".

programme.title: Transformers: Cybertron: Beginning
programme.desc: Representatives of each planet have successively gathered together on Cybertron. The first Space Peace Conference opens with Optimus Prime. Optimus Prime makes a proposal for the construction plan of a new space bridge.

programme.title: Transformers: Cybertron: Inferno
programme.desc: In the final episode of Cybertron peace has settled on the Earth, but new information will reveal why Landmine arrived on Earth and not elsewhere and why Scattershot had such unusual reading when they arrived.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse I
programme.desc: Windblade arrives at Earth before the Decepticons and meets her old friend Bumblebee, who doesn't recognize her.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse I
programme.desc: Windblade is trying to make Bee understand who Megatron is.

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse I
programme.desc: To convince Bumblebee that he is a Decepticon, Shockwave traps him in a false memory.
programme.sub-title: Sabotage/Teletraan - X/Matrix of Leadership/Siloed/King of the Dinosaurs

programme.title: Transformers: Cyberverse I
programme.desc: The newly formed team of Autobots must stop Shockwave from destroying all life on the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Cybertron City
programme.desc: It's been 10 years since Megatron disappeared, and the Autobots and Decepticons now work side by side with humans to harvest Energon. But the Autobots face a new threat: attacks by Transformers known as Terrorcons.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Energon Stars
programme.desc: After analyzing the Terrorcon threat, the Autobots decide to send away all the civilians living in the Energon mining bases.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Scorponok
programme.desc: Scorponok captures Tidal Wave and makes him follow his orders so that they can revive Megatron with energon.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Megatron's Sword
programme.desc: Tidal Wave sees Megatron's sword.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The New Cybertron City
programme.desc: Super Optimus Prime emerges to find his team searching for Energon.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Megatron Resurrected
programme.desc: Megatron is alive again and forces Scorponok to serve him, but Scorponok is loyal to only one master Alpha Q.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Megatron Raid
programme.desc: Megatron launches his first Energon raid since his resurrection.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Starscream the Mysterious Mercenary
programme.desc: Alpha Q has revived Starscream, whose mission is to destroy Optimus Prime, to regain a new body.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Battle of the Asteroid Belt
programme.desc: The Autobots go into the asteroid belt to see what is going on after seeing something on radar, and find parts of Unicron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Energon Tower
programme.desc: A new Autobot weapon is revealed that unleashes vast destruction to the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The Legend of Rodimus
programme.desc: Alpha Q prepares to bring Unicron to life, while yet another Energon Tower is secured into place.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Crisis in Jungle City
programme.desc: Alpha Q is not ready to let Earth go without a fight, and sends a group of stealth Terrorcons, named Command Ravage and Blackout.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Kicker Beware
programme.desc: Megatron forces Demolishor to divulge the Autobots' secret of finding energon: Kicker.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Energon Grid
programme.desc: Megatron has taken yet another plan, to create three meteors from Unicron and propel them at Earth before the energon grid has been completed, which he feels will ‚Äústrike fear in Optimus Prime.‚Äù

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Rodimus: Friend or Foe?
programme.desc: While Snow Cat tests his power against the Energon Grid by sending frozen asteroids, Megatron decides to go after Alpha Q instead of Earth after finding a Terrorcon spy.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Go For Unicron!
programme.desc: Optimus reveals their mission is twofold: they are also going to destroy Unicron, and they prepare to set up a space bridge.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: The Return of Demolishor
programme.desc: The Autobots face a new threat: for Demolisher is revived in a new power, who is tougher than ever.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: A Tale of Two Heroes
programme.desc: The Autobots continue on their journey and intercept a Decepticon warp signal which turns out to be Rodimus's ship. Rodimus asks permission to aboard and Optimus obliges.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Battle Stations
programme.desc: The autobots continue their planning on taking out Unicron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Alpha Q: Identity
programme.desc: Unicron's arrival causes the Decepticons on Cybertron to rebel, while Kicker learns the truth about Alpha Q.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Laser Wave: Rampage
programme.desc: Shockblast disables Cybertron's energon grid, while Kicker tries to convince the Autobots to listen to Alpha Q.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Survival Instincts
programme.desc: Starved for Energon, both Unicron's head and body begin lashing out at their respective captors.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Each One Fights‚Ä¶
programme.desc: Megatron commands Shockblast to lead an assault on Cybertron to take out the Energon towers, and allow Unicron to ‚Äúfeed‚Äù on Cybertron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Unicron Unleashed
programme.desc: Megatron uses the Energon to revive Tidal Wave into Mirage.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Open Fire
programme.desc: As the Autobots fought their way to Megatron within Unicron's body and with Megatron throwing everything at them, Alpha Q provides support by fighting for the control of Unicron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Ripped Up Space
programme.desc: Limping to join with the rest of the Autobots, Optimus Prime is confronted by Shockblast, who plans to take out Optimus Prime to prove that he is superior to Megatron.

programme.title: Transformers: Energon: Team Optimus Prime
programme.desc: Megatron escapes into a black hole and Optimus Prime decides to give chase, even though he doesn‚Äôt know what he will find on the other side. Kicker joins his Autobot friends on their mission and pilots the Miranda II into the black hole.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives
programme.desc: A massive explosion claims the life of a California farmhand, and authorities think it's an accidental death, but analysis of debris shows it's a bomb; investigators have few suspects until they hear ominous rumours about a jealous rage.

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Medical Detectives

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives

programme.title: Bloodline Detectives

programme.desc: After police identify a murder victim thanks to her butterfly necklace, they discover that several of her colleagues had vendettas against her.

programme.title: Vinne Jones USA Toughest Cops: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Vinnie Jones rides with the LAPD Gang units in the notorious district of South Central LA. He goes from the hills to the hood as he experiences the dark side of LA and discovers just why it's so renowned for murder, drugs and gang related crime.

programme.title: Vinnie Jones Toughest Cops: Columbia
programme.desc: Columbia has been at war with itself. violence has been the single biggest killer. Such carnage means the Colombian Police are a force like no other. Four different units are taking on some of the world‚Äôs deadliest criminals.

programme.title: Macintyre: Worlds toughest Towns: Cape Town
programme.desc: Cape Town is one of the world's most popular tourist destinations. However, behind this picturesque setting hides a sinister underworld responsible for one of the highest incidents of rape, armed robbery and murder in the world

programme.title: Macintyre: Worlds toughest Towns: Mexico
programme.desc: Mexico City is one of the largest metropolises in the world, buts it is also the Kidnapping Capital of the world MacIntyre finds himself thrown head first into a city where life is cheap and the criminals operate with impunity.

programme.title: Danny Dyer's Deadliest Men: Bradley Welsh
programme.desc: Danny Dyer returns to familiar ground when he meets former football hooligan, Bradley Welsh. Part of Edinburgh's football gangs in the 80s he was always at the forefront of all the mayhem

programme.title: Danny Dyer's Deadliest Men: Barrington Patterson
programme.desc: Barrington Patterson is a man addicted to violence. After his father was sent to prison, Barrington‚Äôs teenage years were spent prowling football grounds looking for fights as a member of the Zulu Warriors - Birmingham City‚Äôs notorious hooligan gang

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Bent Cop
programme.desc: We look at the motivations that turn a good cop rotten and meet former Liverpool Det Chief Insp Elmore Davies who accepted money for information to villains and got booted out of the force.

programme.title: The Crime Business: The Getaway Driver
programme.desc: We meet Jimmy 'Dixie' Deans one time Glasgow getaway driver turned pornographer who gives us the foot down details of how to out run the law and we learn about the 'multi car' strategy that the true pros employ.

programme.title: NEW Mugshots
programme.desc: Gail Fulton was gunned down by killers in Detroit after her husband jilted Pensacola nurse Donna Trapani.

programme.title: NEW Mugshots: Chris Rocancourt: The Phony Rockefeller
programme.desc: Chris Rocancourt hustled celebs: police say he stole millions in investment scams as a modern-day Robin Hood.

programme.title: Wardens: Blood Trail
programme.desc: Wardens step into the world of CSI this week in determining where a deer was killed. But when uncovering the truth the best thing is to follow the Blood Trail.

programme.title: Wardens: Case Closed
programme.desc: The illegal killing of multiple animals over the past 5 years by a family of poachers is going to trial. Wardens on on the witness stand hoping for a guilty verdict and a Case Closed.

programme.title: Wardens: Law Dodgers
programme.desc: Region 4 Warden Bryan Golie chases down hunters that dodged a game check station. A nearly four hour investigation reveals exactly what they were hiding.

programme.title: Wardens: Crying Shame
programme.desc: Region 5 Warden Nick Taylor is in the crosshairs when a hunter points a gun directly at him. And in Region 2 Wardens find a huntress with a secret she is hiding.

programme.title: Wardens: Illegal Possession
programme.desc: Region 3 Wardens chase down a check station runner only to find the hunters have shot a deer ‚Äì but what and where is the question?

programme.title: Wardens: Under Fire
programme.desc: The drought conditions in Montana threaten to close down hunting and fishing in the Treasure State. But dead fish and restrictions are the least of the Warden's worries when the Bears come to town.

programme.title: Wardens: False Witness
programme.desc: Block Management is one of the keys to great hunting in Montana but the rules are set. If you are going to break them the Wardens will be there to hold you accountable.

programme.title: Wardens: Frozen Fire
programme.desc: When a report of an illegal buck surfaces Warden Joe Kambic goes to work to find the shooters. Things heat up for Warden Rick Smauch when he responds to a fire, and Bryan Golie fights the winter weather just to patrol his area.

programme.title: Wardens: River Rescue
programme.desc: Drownings happen every Summer on Montana's rivers and lakes. Region 1 Warden Chris Crane steps in to save a kayaker while Region 2 Wardens catch friends fishing in the wrong spot.

programme.title: Wardens: Death Valley
programme.desc: Something is killing deer in the Missoula Valley and it has FWP working overtime to find the culprit.

programme.title: Wardens: Careless Endeavors
programme.desc: Opening weekend mayhem has wardens running from one call to the next. But not all violations are negligence.

programme.title: Wardens: Grey Ghost
programme.desc: Wardens get a tip about grey pickup shooting a deer at night; but even joining forces they have a tough time tracking down the Grey Ghost.

programme.title: Wardens: Hidden Truth
programme.desc: When Wardens stop a truck the first of November with Christmas trees in the back they know something is being hidden. Most likely the truth!

programme.title: Wardens: Back Country
programme.desc: Wardens do way more than just drive around in trucks and check licenses. This week the region one wardens go off grid to protect Montana's natural resources.

programme.title: Wardens: Double Kill
programme.desc: Region 5 has a rash of illegal elk kills and it's up to the Wardens to investigate the Double Kills.

programme.title: Wardens: Hot Mess
programme.desc: Wardens gear up for the last week of the season. The pressure is on, putting the Wardens right in the middle of a Hot Mess.

programme.title: Wardens: Long Day
programme.desc: When elk start to migrate the days get long. Wardens keep an eye on the herd and find that at night it really gets weird.

programme.title: Wardens: Bad Decisions
programme.desc: Ethical hunters make the right decisions every day. This week Wardens find themselves confronted with Bad Decisions.

programme.title: Wardens: Fly By
programme.desc: Wardens set up a check station in Region 5. When the hunters decide to run it the chase is on.

programme.title: Wardens: Road Warrior
programme.desc: Wardens set up a decoy to stop road hunting in Region 7. It's not long before they catch a shooter.

programme.title: Wardens: Last Hurrah
programme.desc: A veteran warden works his last season. Wardens look back at the decorated career of one of the best.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Girlfriend Experience
programme.desc: While investigating the disappearance of a grad-student-turned escort, the officers discover a pattern of missing women. Since Gail fits the physical description of the victims, she is sent on an undercover sting at a high-end hotel

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Out Of Time
programme.desc: After the officers of 15 Division are forced to release a suspected predator, the grim discovery of the body of a missing girl reopens an unsolved case ‚Äì bringing back Detective Luke Callaghan in from the Homicide Squad to oversee it.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Cold Comforts
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division are still reeling in the aftermath of the unexpected death of one of their colleagues. When they discover that a laptop has been stolen containing sensitive information, they set out to tie up several of open cases

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Rules
programme.desc: It ºs ‚Äúback to basics‚Äù for 15 Division when Staff Sergeant Frank Best decides it ºs time for his officers to get back on track

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Every Man
programme.desc: A season ºs worth of trials and tribulations come to a head during a frenzied night at the station when the distracted rookies improperly search a prisoner

programme.title: Rookie Blue: I Never
programme.desc: When a violent child abductor escapes from an emergency hospital visit, 15 Division goes on the hunt for the criminal -- only to discover that he ºs taken another young victim

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Surprises
programme.desc: After six months working undercover, Andy and Nick‚Äôs operation goes sideways when Nick, then Andy go missing. Meanwhile, a random arrest at 15 Division puts Sam Swarek and the other officers in the middle of the investigation-turned-rescue-mission

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Homecoming
programme.desc: On her first day back at 15 Division, Andy must work with Swarek to track down an ex convict determined to get his old life back at any cost. Andy realizes just how much has changed since she walked away from her old life six months ago

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Different, Not Better
programme.desc: Andy is partnered with Swarek‚Äôs new girlfriend, Officer Marlo Cruz. When they come face-to-face with an out of control EDP [Emotionally Disturbed Person], their differences are put to the test and one of them has to pull the trigger.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: The Kids Are Not Alright
programme.desc: Andy has her sights set on a much-needed long weekend. But when a routine highway check leads to the discovery of a teenage boy in the trunk of a car, Andy and Gail must convince him that no heartache lasts forever

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Poison Pill
programme.desc: After a messy drug arrest, Andy and Marlo are quarantined together. Meanwhile, 15 Division springs into emergency response mode in order to get the contaminated drugs off the streets before a deadly outbreak sweeps through the city.

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Skeletons
programme.desc: When a young woman is reported missing, the officers of 15 Division soon discover a possible copycat connection to one of their division‚Äôs most distressing cases. With the clock ticking, Gail must face her worst fears..

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: When human bones found in a ravine open up a 15-year-old missing persons case, Swarek reunites with his old training officer to solve the case

programme.title: Rookie Blue: For Better, For Worse
programme.desc: Everyone at 15 Division, especially Andy, just wants a quick, smooth shift so they can get to Frank and Noelle‚Äôs wedding. But things get complicated when they get called to a hijacked casino bus full of senior citizens

programme.title: Rookie Blue: What I Lost
programme.desc: When Chris returns for a visit, his reunion takes a shocking turn when his son, Christian, is abducted while under the care of Andy and Nick

programme.title: Rookie Blue: You Are Here
programme.desc: Near the end of shift, 15 Division busts a marijuana grow-op ‚Äì a case that becomes Traci‚Äôs first homicide and forces Andy, Nick and Gail to work overtime

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Deception
programme.desc: When a suspected pedophile is found beaten within an inch of his life, Andy discovers Marlo has been conducting a mania-fueled, off-hours ‚Äúinvestigation‚Äù

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Under Fire
programme.desc: After Andy and Chloe take fire from an unseen shooter, the officers realize they are the targets of someone with a grudge against 15 Division

programme.title: Rookie Blue: You Can See the Stars
programme.desc: In the wake of a targeted attack on the officers of 15 Division (ep. 412), Andy, Swarek, and their fellow officers have to piece together the truth about a past crime in order to find Oliver Shaw ‚Äì in time to save his life

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Blink
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the night‚Äôs traumatic events, Andy and Dov try to pull themselves together at an all-night diner, but are caught off-duty and off-guard in a volatile diner hold-up.

programme.title: Only the Brave
programme.desc: The Granite Mountain Hotshots become one of the most elite firefighting teams in the country. Watching over lives, homes and everything people hold dear, they forge a unique brotherhood that comes into focus with one fateful fire in Yarnell, Ariz.

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: Trapped townspeople (Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Laurie Holden) face monsters inside and out after a supernatural fog engulfs their Maine community.

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For
programme.desc: In the central story, Dwight McCarthy (Josh Brolin) struggles with his inner demons and tries to maintain control until his former lover, Ava Lord (Eva Green), returns wanting his help to escape her abusive husband.

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: A private detective (Liam Neeson) agrees to help a drug trafficker (Dan Stevens) find the people who kidnapped and murdered his wife.

programme.title: The Son of No One
programme.desc: A rookie police officer (Channing Tatum) who once killed a pair of junkies in his youth remains haunted by the incident.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham uses a shape-shifting monster to destroy Robin Hood (Robin Dunne).

programme.title: Three Musketeers
programme.desc: The MovieSphere Channel is serving up an endless stream of top-quality movies, from blockbuster hits to cult classics and everything in between.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.

programme.title: Beyond Sherwood Forest
programme.desc: The Sheriff of Nottingham uses a shape-shifting monster to destroy Robin Hood (Robin Dunne).

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Wages of Sydney
programme.desc: Quan Shu, Manchuria 1359 BC: The Chinese invent an explosive gift egg. New York, 2001: A rival beats Sydney and Nigel to a map leading to the Dragon's Egg.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Vampire's Kiss
programme.desc: Lucas Blackmer, a babe-magnet, professor and a novelist asks Sydney to help find Vlad Tepes' lost relic. And he isn't the only one after it.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Mr. Right
programme.desc: Sydney runs into her ex Gray and goes on a holiday with him to Bali, but when Derek Lloyd shows up to enlist her to find Parvati's Bowl, she can't resist.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Sydney at Ten
programme.desc: Sydney's roommate from school is on track of a pendant from her past and enlists Sydney to help find it and catch the killer.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Light of Truth
programme.desc: Arabia 843 AD: A sheik uses the Light of Truth to reveal his general as a traitor. 2001: Prince Shareem drops out from Sydney's class to go search for the Light of Truth.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Sydney's on the hunt for a Pirate's booty, but will a traitor force her to walk the plank?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Women Want to Know
programme.desc: Sydney has found a temple with an idol of Ganesha and it is being filmed for TV, but they get trapped inside when the local rebels stumble onto them. Can Nigel and Karen help from USA?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Star of Nadir
programme.desc: An anonymous Sultan's wife Danielle dies in mysterious circumstances in the desert. However, she had called for Sydney to help. Sydney believes Danielle was searching for the Star of Nadir.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Devil Doll
programme.desc: A guide leads Sydney and Nigel to an unusual, underground Aztec burial chamber. Instead of a body, they find a relic.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Incognito
programme.desc: Retrieving a mythical lancet, Sydney and Nigel run into Nigel's look-alike just before his death. Nigel gets a cut from the lancet. Later, Cate persuades Nigel to impersonate the man.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: All Choked Up
programme.desc: Carson Inez, a collector, uses an ancient necklace to get Sydney to help her in raising Athena who will then help her conquer the world.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Warlock of Nu Theta Phi
programme.desc: When Sydney's student Meg's roommate finds a witch's amulet, it hospitalizes Meg. Meg's boyfriend's fraternity brother races to get the amulet. What is he up to?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: While Sydney is lecturing about the Native Americans who faced a mysterious cataclysm 600 years earlier, a native brings her a relic from that era. What is its secret?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Hunting with the Enemy
programme.desc: An urn commissioned in a Cambodian monastery by the Chinese emperor for the remains of Confucius is about to be destroyed by systematic bombing of a whole province.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Under the Ice
programme.desc: Despite terrible weather, Sidney drags Nigel along to an Arctic base where an ancient Indian mummy has been found, who turns out to be an Anasazi.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Antianeirai
programme.desc: Sydney and Nigel travel to Istanbul to investigate the death of one Sydney's friends, a professor who was trying to prove Hercules did exist by finding the Belt of Hippolyte.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Faux Fox
programme.desc: When Nigel is charmed by brilliant student Lorraine to show her their offices (and kiss), a burglar knocks out Sidney, but what was robbed?

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Pandora's Box
programme.desc: Sidney inherits from the best relic hunter of the previous generation a key and rushes with Nigel on the hunt for the one treasure he never found: Pandora's box.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: The Warlord
programme.desc: Bekkastan, 1401 AD: warrior princess Kahina proves her right to rule. 2002: Sydney and Nigel unearth a cave painting that might lead them to Kahina's Saddle. But her descendants cause complications.

programme.title: Relic Hunter: Fountain of Youth
programme.desc: While Nigel rehearses his keynote speech in a Seville hotel room, a girl nearly breaks his nose demanding something - it turns out she was after the water from the Fountain of Youth.

programme.title: Aliens In USSR
programme.desc: Unsolved Soviet Union Alien Mysteries: Dyatlov Pass incident, Petrozavodsk miracle, Voronezh case. Amaze and frighten, but doubt of alien involvement.

programme.title: Ancient Alien America
programme.desc: Native cultures have handed down shocking accounts for generations of Aliens from other worlds visiting Earth in the ancient past and their involvement with them.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: UFO Odyssey
programme.desc: This episode includes: UFO Odyssey, Reporter's Trucker and Haunted Mansion.

programme.title: Deep Sea Aliens
programme.desc: Explore the mysteries of the deep sea: underwater anomalies, alien abductions, USOs, and unexplained cases that defy our understanding.

programme.title: Abducted by Aliens: UFO Encounters of the 4th Kind
programme.desc: Are we being taken by beings from outer space or another dimension? A troubling phenomenon has been occurring for centuries.

programme.title: 27 Alien Encounters
programme.desc: Strange and bizarre UFO encounters abound, but recent Alien encounters by highly credible eyewitnesses are so unusual and perplexing that they challenge our understanding of physics and the Universe as we know it.

programme.title: Unsolved Mysteries: Belgian UFO
programme.desc: This episode includes: Belgian UFO, (Pts. 1 & 2), UD: I.D. Swap, Brenda's Fire and Philip Breen & UD.

programme.title: Alien Cyclops: The Extraordinary Case of Sagrada Familia
programme.desc: In 1963 Brazil, three children witness a UFO in their backyard. An alien cyclops descends, and Mr. Alberto investigates the phenomenon.

programme.title: Aliens and Pyramids
programme.desc: Many pyramidal structures around the world exhibit strange glyphs of futuristic objects and signs of advanced machining with laser perfection. Was there help from an extraterrestrial source?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens : Origin Of Humanity
programme.desc: Increasing evidence and sightings of UFOs suggest contact with extraterrestrial beings who may have influenced the origins of human life.

programme.title: Dulce Base: The New Illuminati
programme.desc: Dulce, New Mexico is a hotspot for mysterious phenomena and alleged secret military collaboration between humans and aliens.

programme.title: UFO Conspiracies: The Hidden Truth
programme.desc: This documentary charts the US government's involvement with UFO phenomenon from 1947 to the present day. Featuring rare classified footage, expert interviews, cover-ups and the revelation of a secret 20 million dollar UFO research program.

programme.title: Project Serpo
programme.desc: 2005: Ex-agent unveils 3,000-page report on a secret ET exchange mission to planet Serpo

programme.title: The Falcon Lake Incident
programme.desc: Aliens visit Earth often; Canada's 1967 Falcon Lake UFO incident stands out. Canada's frequent sightings make it enigmatic.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Evidence of Evil

programme.title: Evidence of Evil

programme.title: Evidence of Evil

programme.title: Evidence of Evil

programme.title: Evidence of Evil

programme.title: Evidence of Evil

programme.title: South Park: Erection Day
programme.desc: Erection Day: Jimmy's noticed that one of his body parts has a mind of his own, so he tries to control his raging hormones in time to perform his comedy routine at the School Talent Show. (S9, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Lil' Crime Stoppers
programme.desc: Lil' Crime Stoppers: Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny decide to play detective; they go around the town solving minor "crimes" for a dollar. It's not long before they're busting meth labs! (S7, E06)

programme.title: South Park: Hotter than Summer: Over Logging
programme.desc: Over Logging: Panic reigns as South Park finds that the internet's gone! The Marshes decide to go hunting for the internet in California and end up in an "internet refugee camp". (S12, E06)

programme.title: South Park: Red Man's Greed
programme.desc: Red Man's Greed: When the entire town is bought out by a Native American casino, the boys come up with a plan to get their homes back - but is more gambling really the solution? (S7, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Hotter Than Summer: Marjorine
programme.desc: Marjorine: Cartman is convinced that the girls have a device which can see into the future. The boys come up with a plan to take it. Unfortunately for Butters he's a major part of the plan. (S9, E09)

programme.title: South Park: South Park Is Gay
programme.desc: South Park is Gay! The TV show Queer Eye For The Straight Guy is sweeping the nation and the men of South Park are embracing metrosexuality, but what evil plan are the hosts plotting? (S7, E08)

programme.title: South Park: Super Fun Time
programme.desc: Super Fun Time: The kids go on a field trip to a 'living museum'. A hostage situation ensues when robbers use the place to evade police. It's up to Cartman and Butters to save the day! (S12, E07)

programme.title: South Park: Christian Rock Hard
programme.desc: Christian Hard Rock: The boys form a band called Moop, but disagree on what direction they should take. Cartman leaves the band and bets them he will have a platinum record first! (S7, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Follow That Egg
programme.desc: Follow That Egg: In a bid to prevent Mr. Slave from marrying Big Gay Al, Mrs. Garrison forces the children to help him in an experiment to prove that gay marriages are unstable. (S9. E10)

programme.title: South Park: Grey Dawn
programme.desc: Grey Dawn: There's an epidemic in South Park. An epidemic of senior citizen related driving accidents! When their licenses are all revoked they decide to fight back military style! (S7, E10)

programme.title: South Park: The China Probrem
programme.desc: The China Probrem: Alarmed by the grandeur of the Olympic ceremonies, Cartman enlists Butters to help him confront the Chinese. (S12, E08)

programme.title: South Park: Casa Bonita
programme.desc: Casa Bonita: Cartman is overjoyed at going to a Mexican restaurant for Kyle's birthday but is crushed when he finds out Butters is invited instead. He'll have to make Butters "disappear". (S7, E11)

programme.title: South Park: Ginger Kids
programme.desc: Ginger Kids: After giving a hate speech against 'the gingers', Cartman awakens the next day with a case of 'Gingervitus' and soon rallies against the persecution of his fellow red heads. (S9, E11)

programme.title: South Park: All About Mormons
programme.desc: All About The Mormons: A new family moves to South Park and their son Gary is an unusually perfect Mormon - this angers the boys no end! Will Stan beat him up or go for a family dinner?! (S7, E12)

programme.title: South Park: Breast Cancer Show Ever
programme.desc: Breast Cancer Show Ever: Cartman's reputation is at stake when he is too afraid to fight Wendy, who is furious about his breast cancer jibes. Cartman then takes things from bad to worse! (S12, E09)

programme.title: South Park: Butt Out
programme.desc: Butt Out: When the boys' smoking leads to a nasty incident, it's the cigarettes that are blamed rather than them. Cue the glutinous Rob Reiner to arrive in town with his anti-smoking lobby! (S7, E13)

programme.title: South Park: Free Willzyx
programme.desc: Free Willzyx: The boys are tricked into believing the killer whale at Sea Park is from the moon. How will Timmy's wheelchair, the Russian government and their skateboards help to free him? (S9, E13)

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Northerners compete in an annihilator. In the first round, all six robots fight each other until one of them is eliminated. The process continues until only two robots remain, with the subsequent winner becoming the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Southerners compete in an annihilator. In the first round, all six robots fight each other until one of them is eliminated. The process continues until only two robots remain, with the subsequent winner becoming the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The UK and USA battle it out to prove which country has the better robots. Each country has four robots representing and fighting for them. A straight knockout competition determine a victor.
programme.sub-title: The Fourth Wars: War of Independence

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The weekly battle continues as six more remote-controlled fighting machines attempt to become Fourth Wars champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Craig Charles and Julia Reed introduce more gladiatorial robots to the metal-mangling arena, which this week sees the seeded X-Terminator and Behemoth face four other foes.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: An extensive and informative dive behind-the-scenes on the House Robots. Get inside information from designer Chris Reynolds, on what goes into creating these killing machines.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Follow Team Chaos's journey, from humble beginnings to how they ended up building one of the most feared Robots ever to compete.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Using competitors own video diaries, exclusive action from the pits and the best of the battles, Philippa Forrester will get down to the nuts and bolts of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars'.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Extreme
programme.desc: Craig Charles and Philippa Forrester oversee the mechanical mayhem. Jonathan Pearce supplies his inimitable brand of commentary and in-depth analysis.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Featuring behind-the-scenes footage of Heat C of `Robot Wars: The Second Wars', including video diaries of the Dreadnaut and Oblivion teams preparing their robots competitors for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: presented behind-the-scenes footage of Heat D of Robot Wars: The Second Wars, including video diaries of the Razer, Bodyhammer and Elvis teams preparing their robots for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars: Revealed
programme.desc: Behind-the-scenes footage of Heat E of Robot Wars: The Second Wars, including video diaries of the Technophobic and Killertron teams preparing their robots for the main competition.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Celebrities take to the arena, teaming up with veterans from the series and their robots. The celebrities must control the robots for at least 60 seconds before the professionals can take over.
programme.sub-title: The Fourth Wars: Celebrity Robot Wars

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Four teams take part in the tag team terror tournament. Two teams comprised of two robots enter the arena at once. Only one robot is allowed to battle, only being able to switch with their team-mate by entering their team's coloured zone.
programme.sub-title: The Fourth Wars: Tag Team Terror

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Northerners compete in an annihilator. In the first round, all six robots fight each other until one of them is eliminated. The process continues until only two robots remain, with the subsequent winner becoming the annihilator champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The UK and USA battle it out to prove which country has the better robots. Each country has four robots representing and fighting for them. A straight knockout competition determine a victor.
programme.sub-title: The Fourth Wars: War of Independence

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: The weekly battle continues as six more remote-controlled fighting machines attempt to become Fourth Wars champion.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Craig Charles and Julia Reed introduce more gladiatorial robots to the metal-mangling arena, which this week sees the seeded X-Terminator and Behemoth face four other foes.

programme.title: Robot Wars
programme.desc: Former champions Panic Attack and Aggrobot II are ready to battle for a place in the semi-finals.

programme.title: A Haunting: Dark Wrath
programme.desc: Unsettling nightmares of a dark angry figure plague Cindy as she prepares to move her family.

programme.title: A Haunting: Legend Trippers
programme.desc: High school classmates test out an old ghost story on Halloween night.

programme.title: A Haunting: A Haunting in Florida
programme.desc: Ed, Beth and their toddler soon learn they are not alone at their ranch house.

programme.title: A Haunting: Tunnel Of Death
programme.desc: Candace and John St. Clair explore a haunted tunnel with a gruesome history where slaves were buried alive. Stealthily, an uninvited guest follows them home. Attacked by the entity, they invite paranormal experts to investigate and cleanse the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Trapped In Terror
programme.desc: Soon after moving into an older home in a quaint suburb of Cincinnati, OH, Taylor Jones catches her mother practicing black magic in her daughter Isabelle‚Äôs bedroom. Her fears become reality when Taylor notices Isabelle playing with an invisible friend.

programme.title: A Haunting: Demon Child
programme.desc: Jan‚Äôs young son Cody begins communicating with an imaginary friend. She calls on a shaman.

programme.title: A Haunting: Angels And Demons
programme.desc: Maryland single Mom Kathie Sheats hopes life will change for the better when she marries her boyfriend Brian. But "something" inside her house has other ideas. Spiritual warfare literally breaks out...taking over Kathie's mind, body and soul.

programme.title: A Haunting: Where Demons Dwell
programme.desc: Young David suffers from intense nightmares and is physically attacked by an invisible entity.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Shadowman
programme.desc: Tim Yancey and his older brother Tom love playing in the woods surrounding their Florida home. One afternoon Tom senses a presence watching him from among the shadows. Days later, the same entity confronts Tim and chases him through the woods.

programme.title: A Haunting: The Wheatsheaf Horror
programme.desc: New owners of the Wheatsheaf Pub find bits of clothing and bones behind the walls.

programme.title: A Haunting: Ghost Confessions
programme.desc: An unknown entity appears to find pleasure in terrifying 17-year-old Macy Sherman, her younger sister Kelsey and their mom Carrie. The family reaches out for help, praying that they can get rid of the spirit intent on staying in their home forever.

programme.title: A Haunting: Dark Forest
programme.desc: Clara and her family move to rural New York but find that peaceful country life is an illusion.

programme.title: A Haunting: Casa de los Muertos
programme.desc: Eddie Benitez fears the spirit of a dead man who committed suicide is slowly killing his son.

programme.title: A Haunting: Hidden Terror
programme.desc: After Mike and Lisa move in their new house, Lisa‚Äôs personality begins to change dramatically.

programme.title: A Haunting: Gateway to Hell
programme.desc: Bobby Mackey has heard tales that the river by his club draws Satanists to the area.

programme.title: A Haunting: Love Curse
programme.desc: When Lee and his new bride Claire settle into their first home, an evil entity emerges and attacks Claire while she's carrying the couple's unborn baby. A ghost hunter determines the dark spirit is a demon and brings in demonologists to cleanse the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Wicked Eviction
programme.desc: Tammy Shea, a single mother of three, relocates her family for a fresh start but her dream turns to a nightmare when her family is antagonized by multiple entities. Desperate, Tammy finds a paranormal team who reveal the true evil in the home.

programme.title: A Haunting: Shape Of Evil
programme.desc: Jay Yaple persuades his wife that Enfield, CT, is the perfect place for them. After a series of unexplained events, Jay discovers the house has a dark history of mysterious deaths. Anyone who attempts to come to their aid is driven away by the demon.

programme.title: Eggheads
programme.desc: The Eggheads team are made up of some of Britain's top quizzers. They face a team of challengers trying to beat the incumbents in order to win a cash prize. If the Eggheads beat the challengers, the cash prize is rolled over to subsequent episodes.

programme.desc: When Aang and friends come to the rim of a giant canyon, they are asked to help guide two groups of refugees across. Aang quickly learns that this will be no easy task.
